Jeux éducatifs pour apprendre l'alphabet en douceur. Voix et textes en français. [Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité / vous pouvez tester ce jeu dans sa version gratuite] Jeux éducatifs pour apprendre à reconnaître les lettres de l'alphabet. Ce jeu, destiné aux enfants à partir de 2 ans, a la particularité de rendre l'enfant complètement autonome dans son apprentissage, même s'il ne sait pas lire, car il est uniquement réalisé à partir de symboles simples, et les instructions sont lues clairement (nécessité d’avoir du son). Ce jeu éducatif est entièrement en français (textes et voix). Il y a trois modes de jeux : - un jeu qui invite l'enfant à reconnaître la première lettre d'un animal ("A comme Abeille") - un jeu pour apprendre, facilement, à reconnaître une lettre parmi d'autres - un jeu pour apprendre à reconnaître une lettre parmi de nombreuses autres. Une musique très douce accompagne l’enfant dans son exercice, et à chaque fois qu’il trouve, il est encouragé dans ses efforts par des applaudissements et des "bravo". L’interface a été spécialement conçue pour les enfants. Le style graphique est doux et coloré, et propose une animation de plusieurs "scrollings" pour adoucir l’exercice. Les lettres se détachent de l’écran de manière beaucoup plus vive pour être bien identifiables par l'enfant. Ce jeu permettra à votre enfant d’apprendre, tout en s’amusant, à décrypter les lettres de l’alphabet, à les prononcer, à identifier les animaux (abécédaire)... et surtout, il passera un très agréable moment. Pour l’anecdote, ce jeu a été réalisé pour ma fille de 3 ans… Devant son succès, je l’ai mis sur le « Play Store ». Je suis sûr qu’il rendra vos enfants tout aussi heureux d’y jouer… Educational games to learn the alphabet smoothly. Voices and texts in French. [Warranty virus free and no advertising / you can test the game in its free version] Educational games to learn to recognize the letters of the alphabet. This game, for children from 2 years, has the distinction of making the child completely autonomous in their learning, even if he can not read because it is only made from simple symbols, and instructions are read clearly (need sound). This educational game is entirely in French (text and voice). There are three game modes: - A game that invites the child to recognize the first letter of an animal ("A Bee as") - A game to learn, easy to recognize a letter among other - A game to learn to recognize a letter among many others. A very soft music accompanies the child in the exercise, and every time it finds, it is encouraged in its efforts with applause and "Bravo". The interface has been specifically designed for children. The graphic style is sweet and colorful, and offers several animation "scrolling" to soften the year. The letters stand for the screen so much more vivid to be easily identified by the child. This game will help your child to learn while having fun, to decipher the letters of the alphabet, to pronounce, to identify animals (ABC) ... and most importantly, he spent a very pleasant time. For the record, this game was made for my 3 year old daughter ... of its success, I put on the "Play Store". I'm sure your children will be just as happy to play it ...

description: © Health Education Thames Valley and Health Education Wessex Learn the formulae to calculate and administer drugs for adults, practise your skills and see how well you’re doing with this 40 minute app. Learn how to: • use a formula to calculate the number of millilitres for infusions and boluses of drugs • calculate millilitres per hour and drops per minute when running volumes of solutions • use the metric system and a variety of concentrations • demonstrate using a variety of expressed concentrations in calculations. This app is designed for nurses and midwives who are newly qualified, returning to practice, adapting to practice in the UK and any other nurse or midwife who wants to update their practice in accordance with their personal/professional development plan. PLEASE NOTE: you will need approximately 17 Mb for the App and and 11Mb for Adobe Air to be installed in your device in order to use the Flash animations and video content in this App. You will automatically be prompted to install Adobe Air if not already on your device. Keywords: NHS,Adult,drug,calculation,calculations,metric,dosages,infusion,concentration,solution,drugs,ampoule,bolus,medicine,formula,administration, Epic

description: "It's a smartly and elegantly designed game that's not afraid to permakill you" --IndieGames.com "The distilled essence of every 8-bit action role-playing game ever. Love it." --Kotaku "Bit Dungeon brings together The Legend of Zelda’s top-down dungeon stomping, Diablo’s loot lust, and the unforgiving difficulty of roguelikes within a slick retro-style quest." --Mac|Life "It’s great fun, made even more entertaining by the retro visuals that bring to mind classics like The Legend of Zelda on NES." --Game Trailers √ As featured in TegraZone! √ Play it on NVIDIA SHIELD! √ 16-bit Graphics √ 8-bit music from STRESS_TN http://chiptunerush.com/bit-dungeon/ You and your wife were captured by demons... You wake up what seems like hours, maybe even days later trapped in a prison cell, and your wife is missing. You find a sword in your cell and vow revenge against the beasts who took your wife - the quest to find your wife and destroy the demons begins! bit Dungeon combines the randomized loot of Diablo and fast action combat of Zelda. Explore randomized dungeons and hack and slash your way through dangerous bosses. The difficultly increases as you become stronger and stronger. Build your character how you want with deadly passive abilities. Just like the classic quarter crunchers of old, if you die you lose everything and start all over. Can you make it to the end and save the day? •If you die you lose all items and start over. •Extra Life: at Level 4 you receive a Soul after the boss instead of more magic. When you die this soul gives you a second chance. Nvidia Shield Controls: •“Left Analog Stick” to control the character. •Hold down the “A" Button to charge up and use a STUN ATTACK. •Once CHARGED your next attack will be a POWER ATTACK dealing the total [Attack Damage+Critical Damage+Armor] •Hold down the “A" Button to BLOCK any attack. Touch Screen Controls: •“Touch” to control the character. •Hold down “Touch” to charge up and use a STUN ATTACK. •Once CHARGED your next attack will be a POWER ATTACK dealing the total [Attack Damage+Critical Damage+Armor] •Hold Down “Touch” to BLOCK any attack. *Stats* LifeRegen – Regens life slowly over time. LifeSteal – Steals life and heals you per hit. DeathStrike – Chance to instant kill normal enemies. Chop – Chance to take off 25% of total life in one hit. Cleave – Chance to do "Double" attack Damage. Proc – Chance to shoot a magic bolt on hit. Crit – Chance to do a Critical hit (Critical Damage3). Defend – Chance to block all enemy Damage on hit. RunSpeed – the movement speed of your character. Attack Damage – Normal hit Damage. Critical Damage – Critical hit Damage. Armor – Reduces Damage by a percent. Life – Increases max life. *Note: If it seems your device resolutions isn't supported e-mail kintogames@gmail.com I will support that device with an update* facebook.com/KintoGames

I took into account the proven fact that women have better auditory systems than men, and fine-tuned the audio to get a predominantly (young) female response. Eventhough disproven scientifically, a 'Subliminal Message' feature allows you to activate back-masked subliminal messages to be played over the generated tone as an experiment. And your pants is where you want to direct her attention! Actually, the program draws attention to you, it makes you stand out in the crowd. The Fake Call mode can be used once you've got a girl's attention to appear popular and seal the deal. (Girls want what they can't have, especially mine) Features -*-*-*-*- - 5 Selectable Frequencies - Subliminal Messages using Backmasking (ex:'Hot', 'Sexy', etc.) - Fake Call Mode! description: This program opens a VPN connection through the bluetooth channel and implement reverse DUN features. It requires BlueDUN installed and running on the host device or a GPRS modem/phone with an available BT DUN profile. This app works ONLY IF your device can manage VPN connections, in particular if the TUN.KO module is present. This module strictly depends on the hardware and must be compiled specifically for it. Some manufacturers prepare the firmware without re-compile that module or they even remove the file, so, it is not possible to open a VPN and not possible to use apps for the VPN (like OpenVPN or DroidVPN); please take a look to this link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.aed.tun.installer INSTALLATION: 1. Create the BT pairing between this client device (with BlueVPN installed) and the host device 2. Make sure you have a valid internet connection and the BT-DUN profile on host; if necessary install the BlueDUN app 3. Create a new VPN L2TP connection on client device, set "BlueVPN" as name and the VPN server equals to "127.0.0.1" 4. In case of direct modem connection (no Android phones) insert in the setting panel, the dial phone number, the access point and the other connection parameters NORMAL USAGE: 1. Enable the wifi/mobile data connection on client (required only to allow the VPN connection opening, but not used for data transfers) 2. Activate the bluetooth interface or open the BlueDUN app on host device 3. Open the BlueVPN app on client, click the host name in the BT device list 4. If BlueVPN does not connect automatically (Honeycomb), start it manually from the system settings (set any username and password) 5. While BlueVPN is connected you can open a browser and navigate the internet throught the bluetooth tethering NOTE - there are applications that cannot retrieve network data from the VPN connection due to an Android bug ( http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=33666 ), please refer to the following list: WORK FINE: - GMail - Email [ POP3 / IMAP ] - Google+ - Facebook - Twitter - You Tube - Google Earth - Google Maps - Google Play (browse only) - Google Goggles - Kindle app - eBay app - SoundHound - Web Navigation (Chrome/Firefox/Dolphin...) DON'T WORK: - Google Play download - Skype - Zedge - Tune In If you like this application please make a video and post it on youtube to show how it works to other users
release_text: - solved the disconnection issues - added the client interface for no Android modem/phones (reverse DUN) - added the Modem compatibility option At the moment, this app requires a Wi-Fi connection to start-up the VPN. I'm working to bypass this limitation. For Honeycomb devices disconnect the VPN before stop the BlueVPN app (possible system crash otherwise), for other Android versions the VPN should disconnect automatically when exit the app.

The BMO Retirement App is a read-only App that lets you view your retirement account and current plan information any time from your Android™ smartphone. To complete transactions in your account, please visit mybmoretirement.com. With the BMO Retirement App, you get hands-on access to your retirement savings. - Check your account balances - View investment price/performance - Review contribution rates - See how your account is currently allocated - View your personal rate of return - Verify loan balances - Look at your account activity Your account’s security is important to us. You are required to have established a User ID and Password on the mybmoretirement.com website prior to accessing the mobile App. Once a User ID and Password have been established, the same credentials will apply to both the website and mobile App. For questions or additional information about your retirement plan, please choose the most convenient way of contacting us. This information is also available in the App by tapping the “i” Info icon. - Call the My BMO Retirement Line at 1-800-858-3829. For the automated telephone service to access your retirement plan account information, press 1. To speak to a BMO Retirement Services Specialist, press 2. Call us 24 hours a day, seven days a week at your convenience. - Email a BMO Retirement Services Specialist at mybmoretirement@bmo.com . A BMO Retirement Services Specialist will reply within 24-48 hours during the normal business week. Please be aware the email you are sending is not secure, so don't include confidential information such as passwords, account numbers and Social Security Numbers.

description: The Booking.com hotel app puts over 600,000 properties at your fingertips for simple and secure booking on your Android phone and tablet. You'll find the ideal accommodation – anywhere, anytime – best price guaranteed. WHY CHOOSE THE BOOKING.COM APP? - When you need a hotel in a hurry, in one tap you can find the best hotels closest to you for tonight — and even book participating hotels without a credit card! - And we don’t just have hotels—check out our range of villas, apartments, B&Bs, hostels and more in over 70,000 destinations worldwide. - 40 million verified guest reviews help you find the perfect place to stay. - Then, once you’ve booked, your confirmation is stored in the app to use at check-in. It’s available even if you don’t have internet access, so you’ll never print (or forget) your confirmation again! - If you also use Booking.com on your computer, sign into your account and have your bookings, recent searches, lists, account details and more automatically synced to the app. Pick up where you left off, at any time. FINDING THE PERFECT PLACE TO STAY - Search by city, landmark or even hotel name – or search for properties close by in one tap. - Sort by what’s important to you: best price, deals, guest review score, and more. - Then narrow your search results with handy filters: price range, city districts, or facilities (e.g swimming pool, free WiFi, parking) and more. - Switch to map view to find hotels in your preferred neighbourhood. HINT: If you’re on tablet you can actually draw a specific area on the map with your finger to find results there! - Large photos on tablet put you in the picture (and the mood) for your next trip. - You can also save your favourite dreamy places to personalised lists (think of them as holiday wish lists!), which are synced across all devices if you’re signed into your Booking.com account. - Sign in to your Booking.com account and we’ll automatically fill your details for even faster booking – including the credit cards you have chosen to store. - The app is available in 42 languages and you can view prices in 53 currencies. GET THE BEST HOTEL DEALS We showcase the best deals at all kinds of amazing properties (not just cheap hotels!) - Secret Deals: You get first pick on great deals for hotels, apartments, resorts and more worldwide! - Value Deals: Book hotels with the best value for their price and location. - Late Deals: Find cheap hotels for last-minute hotel bookings near you. HELPING YOU AT EVERY STEP OF YOUR STAY - Save your booking confirmation to your photo gallery or access it offline in the app to check-in easily, even without an internet connection. - Find the way to your stay quickly and easily with maps. - Adding hotel bookings to your calendar makes planning multiple stays easier. - You can cancel or modify bookings on the move. - Access 24/7 customer service by phone or email. ALREADY A BOOKING.COM USER? - After installing the app, sign in to the account you use on the Booking.com website. All of your hotel bookings, searches, viewed hotels, wish lists and account information will automatically be available in the app. - You can easily switch between devices whenever you like. So if you’re at home on your laptop, or using your mobile on the move — all of your searches, bookings and more will be updated automatically as long as you’re signed in. - You only have to sign in to your account once; we’ll keep you signed in to the app. - If you don’t have a Booking.com account, but made a booking on the website, you can import your booking to the app. Go to “My Bookings” in the account area and import using the Booking Number and PIN from your confirmation (also sent to you by email). WEEKEND INSPIRATION Add the Booking.com Weekend Deals Widget to your device’s home screen for the best hotel deals recommended for you. Choose between an apartment in Paris, a villa in Tuscany, or a penthouse suite in New York — the list goes on!
release_text: REASSURANCE Now we highlight the last day you can cancel for free, the price per room for group bookings, and all other important details in your booking summary to reassure you that you’re making the right choice. CONVENIENCE Your trip just got tastier. Our Travel Guides now let you make a restaurant reservation through OpenTable in supported cities.

description: Bowometry measures arrow velocity and kinetic energy from actual bow shots! Bowometry's innovative audio chronograph detects the elapsed time between arrow release and target impact, and computes detailed ballistics information--using only your mobile device! Just select a shot distance, set your phone down, and start collecting real performance data you can use. With Bowometry, you'll never have an unproductive range session again. Measure arrow velocity, kinetic energy, drop, and flight-time . Bowometry goes beyond the limitations and expense of traditional chronographs, making it easy to discover the true performance of your bow and arrow. Create and manage equipment profiles . Testing multiple bow and arrow configurations is the best way to learn which combination of speed and power best suits your needs. Bowometry links equipment details to each shot, so you can easily track and compare performance differences. Save detailed ballistics records for each shot . Bowometry keeps historical shot data at your fingertips, and can export your shot history with the push of a button for further analysis in a spreadsheet program. Adjustable chronograph settings . Bowometry can detect shots from even the quietest bows with an adjustable sensitivity setting. Bowometry goes beyond the limitations and expense of traditional chronographs, making it easy to discover the true performance of your bow and arrow from launch to impact. A valuable mobile tool for bow hunters and target archers alike! Remember to always exercise safety and caution when firing your bow!
release_text: Version 2.0: NEW FEATURES - Export shot history to CSV file - Repeat shot using same parameters - Adjust shot-detection sensitivity - Toggle between US customary and metric units UPDATES - Streamlined shot setup - User interface enhancements - Improved shot history performance

description: The Brew Timer is for brewers, professional and amateur alike, who need a better way to keep track of their brew during the brew day. The application allows the brewer to create individual entries for the timing of different brewing events like the addition of hops, spices, a wort chiller, etc. These events can also include a post-boil steeping time, allowing brewers to keep track of additional lengths of time after the boil ends. These events can be grouped together as a Brew Session and can be saved to device memory in a Recipe Profile that can then be loaded when needed for future use. Each Recipe Profile contains all the events needed for a complete brew session. Brew Timer Features: - Create, save, load, and delete multiple Recipe Profiles. - Each Recipe Profile can contain events for all timed brewing processes. - The Brew Timer can sound a user selected alarm and/or vibrate when an event needs your attention. - Events can be added, edited, or removed while the the timer is running in case a modification needs to be made on the fly. - Color-coding of individual event entry’s remaining time lets you quickly determine how soon an event will trigger. - The Brew Timer can be paused and resumed at any time. The Brew Timer is also great for timing coffee roasting, baking or anything else you may need to keep track of multiple timing events. Is there something you would like to see in The Brew Timer? I have a list of other desired features that other brewers have emailed me, send me an email and tell me what you want! ( brewtimer@humanjoe.com )
release_text: 0.9.47 - Found a couple of small bugs that were setting off event alarms at wrong time. It was annoying so I wanted to get a fix out quickly. 0.9.46 - Added code to allow the event alarms to be heard while on a phone call. - Added a new feature that lets the user enable a Pre-Event Notification. A Pre-Event Notification is an alarm that occurs a set number of seconds before an actual event happens allowing the user to prepare. - Added ability to adjust the font size of on screen text.

description: Bricknoid is a classic block breaking game like Arkanoid, Breakout and dxBall, in which you break bricks using your block paddle and a ball. Are you up to the challenge of becoming the ultimate brick breaker? Features - Beautiful, colorful and customizable HD graphics! - 136 Unique Fun Levels with tons of blocks. - Extreme Challenge Mode with unlimited bricks to break! - 3 difficulty levels, Easy, Normal and Hard. - Online leaderboards for Extreme Challenge Mode. - Game statistics; total bricks broken, time played, and more! - Optimized for both smartphones and tablet computers! - Share your Extreme Challenge High Scores on Facebook, let your friends know you're awesome in Bricknoid: Brick Breaker! - Laser power-up to destroy bricks with style! Coming soon - New brick types (explosive brick, astral brick) - More colorful blocks - More fun power-ups (gravity, block buster) - More fun levels with dozens of bricks to break Feel free to send an e-mail to driantgames@gmail.com or add a comment here to ask any questions or make suggestions to make Bricknoid: Brick Breaker better. We'll try to respond and help as soon as possible. Bricknoid: Brick Breaker is a free game developed using libGDX Framework. The game is supported by non-intrusive 3rd party advertisements (they are not shown during gameplay, or on areas that might be accidentally clicked). Bricknoid Help Page: http://bricknoid.tokur.net/help.aspx Have fun destroying blocks and bricks!

Bubble level also known as spirit level is a free, handy, accurate, simple to use and incredibly useful tool for your Android device. A spirit level or bubble level is an instrument designed to indicate whether a surface is horizontal (level) or vertical (plumb). Vials on modern level meter have a slightly curved glass tube which is incompletely filled with a liquid, usually a colored spirit or alcohol, leaving a bubble in the tube. At slight inclinations the bubble travels away from the center position, which is usually marked. Bubble Level app tries to mimic the real level meter and displays the data as real level meter would. An extension of the spirit level is the bull's eye level: a circular, flat-bottomed device with the liquid under a slightly convex glass face with a circle at the center. It serves to level a surface across a plane, while the tubular level only does so in the direction of the tube. Where a spirit level must be usable upside-down, the banana-shaped tube is replaced by a barrel-shaped tube. Bubble Level app tries to mimic the real bull's eye level and displays the data as real bull's eye level would. Where any why use Bubble Level? A bubble level is a device used in construction, carpentry and photography that determines if objects on which you're working are level. Used properly, a bubble level can help you create flawlessly level pieces of furniture, staircases and homes. A bubble level is also helpful when setting up a tripod for photographs or when hanging paintings or other items on the wall. If the data shown is not correct you will need to calibrate your device as follows: 1. Open "Setting" App 2. Find "Motions and gestures" and tap on it 3. Tap on "Gyroscope calibration" 4. Place device on a level surface and tap Calibrate Bubble Level app is the best tool for all your leveling needs, best and most advanced level meter on Google play.

description: Finalmente sbarca sul tuo smartphone il vero gioco del Burraco! Pocket Burraco è il nuovo software che permette di giocare a Burraco in partite individuali e di coppia contro una AI ben programmata e finalmente competitiva, che pone un livello di sfida anche per i giocatori pù esperti. Pocket Burraco sfrutta a pieno le risorse messe a disposizione dal S.O. Android e dalle moderne tecnologie degli smartphone: la grafica è ben realizzata e curata nei dettagli, le carte anche se di dimensioni ridotte per non coprire interamente il tavolo da gioco, rimangono ben visibili anche in caso di numerosi giochi lunghi calati a terra. Anche le animazioni delle carte sono ben fluide ed accattivanti. La professionalità con cui è realizzato il softeware si vede già dall'introduzione, col logo del gioco che campeggia sul panno verde del tavolo da gioco, accompagnato da una musica molto orecchiabile, che non stanca mai; alla musica si sostituiscono gli effetti sonori delle carte durante il gioco e cori di voci esultanti o deluse alla fine della partita, in caso di vittoria o sconfitta (e contro l' AI di Pocket Burraco, potrete effettivamente perdere!). Il tutto è gestibile comodamente tramite il touchscreen del dispositivo portatile, che si rivela un ottimo strumento per selezionare le carte, calarle o legarle ai giochi già a terra; il tutto risulta molto intuitivo, ma se proprio si dovessero avere difficoltà, un comodo tutorial è presente nel software: diverse sono infatti le opzioni di contorno al gioco: è possibile scegliere partite a 1005 punti, 2005 punti ed a 1, 3 o 5 smazzate, il livello di difficoltà (tra facile, medio, difficile) e molto altro. Il punto forte del gioco rimane comunque l'elevato grado dell'intelligenza artificiale, che darà del filo da torcere (soprattutto a livello difficile) ai giocatori di burraco, anche ai più esperti. Basta con avversari computerizzati che scartano pinelle e non raccolgono dagli scarti: con Pocket Burraco, giocare – specialmente in partite 2 vs. 2 – non è mai stato così coinvolgente, sembra a volte di giocare proprio con altri giocatori umani. Provate Pocket Burraco, per avere a portata di mano, sempre, il gioco del burraco! - CPU molto competitiva nei 3 livelli di difficoltà proposti; - realizzazione tecnica e grafica eccellente; - giocabilità immediata e coinvolgente Finally lands on your smartphone the real game of Rummy! Pocket Burraco is the new software that allows you to play Rummy games in individual and couple against an AI well planned and finally competitive, which poses a level of challenge for players pù experts. Pocket Burraco takes full advantage of the resources available to OS Android and the modern technology of smartphones: the graphics are well done and attention to detail, the cards even if small not to cover the entire table, remain clearly visible even in the case of many games long fallen to the ground. Even the animation of the cards are very smooth and appealing. The professionalism with which it is made the softeware is already apparent in the introduction, with the logo of the game that stands on the green baize of the table, accompanied by a very catchy music, that never tires, music sound effects replace the cards during the game and a chorus of voices jubilant or disappointed at the end of the game, if you win or lose (and against the 'AI Pocket Burraco, you can actually lose!). Everything can be controlled easily via the touch screen of the mobile device, which proves to be a great tool to select cards, calarle or tie them to the games already on the ground, everything is very intuitive, but if you have difficulty, a convenient tutorial present in the software are in fact different options contour to the game: you can choose games 1005 points, 2005 points and at 1, 3 or 5 ruffle, the level of difficulty (from easy, medium, hard) and much more. The strong point of the game is still a high degree of artificial intelligence, which will give a hard time (especially on Hard difficulty) players to burraco, even to experts. Enough with computer opponents discarding pinelle and collect from residues: Pocket burraco play - especially in games 2 vs. 2 - has never been so addictive, it sometimes seems to play just with other human players. Try Pocket Burraco, to have at hand, always playing burraco! - CPU very competitive in 3 difficulty levels offered; - Technical realization and excellent graphics; - Immediate and engaging gameplay
release_text: Aggiunta la possibilità di disattivare il sonoro senza agire sul volume di sistema. Nuove modalità di ordinamento carte: - Selezionando 2 carte di valore identico es: due 5 e mantenendo premuto sul tavolo si ordinerà per valore - Selezionando 2 carte di valore differente es: 5 di picche e un 6 di stesso o altro seme e mantenendo premuto sul tavolo si ordinerà per seme Risolti i problemi relativi al database che impediva l'avvio dell'applicazione in alcune periferiche android.

description: The most complete business idea app on Android. This app helps your startup in 3 amazing ways: 1) Inside the app we have online business ideas that can begin making you money as early as today or within a few days! The business ideas on this app are proven ways to make money online. We walk you through how to set up your site and begin making money with ads or affiliate sales. 2) Live expert help and coaching by a real person via chat right on the app to give you feedback on your business idea, or help you plan a strategy for how to make your startup idea into a real business. Ask unlimited questions and get guidance in a 100% confidential and private setting. There is nothing like getting advice and feedback on your business idea from a real person. 3) Numerous articles and tutorials about various business idea topics: - How to tell if your business idea is good - How to get business ideas - Psychology of being a small business owner and an entrepreneur - Evolution of a business ideas and how they change over time. This is what happens to your idea after you get the business idea. - What to do if you have too many business ideas and how to choose the best idea - Common business idea mistakes - Protecting business ideas after you get the business ideas, and whether you should protect them at all For the low price of the app, you can get live confidential feedback and advice about your business ideas. And if you are looking for ideas, we offer proven business ideas and step by step guidance for how you can begin making money online today or within a few days. Privacy information: Only staff sees the questions you ask about your business or startup idea. The ideas are not shared with anyone. WHO IS THIS APP FOR: - This app is for people who are looking for a business idea that makes money, or need help and advice on their current business or startup idea which they want to turn into a successful business. For tech support issues, email the app developer directly at alex.genadinik@gmail.com Visit the Problemio website at http://www.problemio.com for more apps and information.

description: Mississauga bus schedules app stores all Mississauga local bus - miway(mi way) bus timings in your android mobile phone and works without 3G or internet. It has many features like offline storing of routes data, favourite route/stops for easy and fast access, auto updates download, Listing all buses passing through a stop, etc. 3G or internet is only required to download this app , verify license on first time login and to install service updates if any. This app is for Mississauga (Ontario, canada) people who are using mississauga bus transit. After installing, Please click on Service Updates until you get a message "You currently have latest service information" ** Features 1) Offline bus schedules of all Mississauga bus routes. 2) Adding favourite route/stops for easy and fast access. 3) Auto service updated download. 4) Listing of all buses/routes through a stop. This application is not affiliated with the City of Mississauga or MiWay in any way. The bus timings data is extracted from the City/MiWay Web site(s) and is provided “as is” and without warranty as to its correctness, timeliness, and completeness By accessing or using this application you agree that this application and all of its operations are not error free. By entering this application you agree and acknowledge that use of this application is at your own risk.

A very simple to use Automatic Call Recorder app. Just install and forget. Each call whether incoming or outgoing will be recorded seamlessly. An intuitive interface ensures that the calls recorded are displayed in a list with inbuilt media player. The recordings can be setup automatically to be backed up using Dropbox. Features: 1. Auto recording incoming and outgoing calls 2. You can see call details for particular recorded calls 3. Enable/Disable auto call recording 4. Turn on/off notification while recording call 5. You can manage count of recording calls (Mange Inbox size) 6. You can change file type of call to be recorded 7. Mange black list that you want to ignore recording for particular contacts 8. Mange audio source 9. You can ignore all contacts OR can ignore black listed contacts for auto recording 10. Mange ignore contact list 11. Auto Sync with Dropbox Cloud Sync *Please note that recording might not work on some phones. This is a hardware limitation. On some phones it might only record the incoming voice and not outgoing voice.

Cu A-CAR Go!, aplicaţia mobilă a Asociaţiei Asistenţei Rutiere din România, oricine poate vizualiza rapid partenerii comerciali A-CAR şi reducerile oferite de aceştia membrilor, precum şi harta celor mai importante instituţii publice şi ONG-uri din România. Fiecare punct de interes este poziţionat individual şi are afişate datele de contact. Mai mult decât atât, dacă instalezi aplicaţia pe un dispozitiv mobil cu funcţie GPS, poţi crea uşor o rută de navigaţie către oricare dintre cele peste 10.000 de posibile destinaţii. Şi ca să fim siguri că vei avea parte de un drum lipsit de neplăceri, A-CAR Mobile îţi indică pe hartă camerele video de control rovinietă, precum şi radarele fixe şi mobile introduse de alţi utilizatori ai aplicaţiei. Lor trebuie să le mulţumeşti pentru această funcţie şi credem că o poţi face simplu, adăugând la rândul tău alte alerte temporare, atunci când eşti pe drum şi te întâlneşti cu o situaţie similară! Detalii pe www.a-car.ro With A-CAR Go!, Mobile application Welfare Association Road in Romania, anyone can quickly view trading partners A-CAR and discounts offered by these members and map the most important public institutions and NGOs in Romania. Each point of interest is individual and has positioned the contact listed. Moreover, if you install the application on a mobile device with GPS function, you can easily create a shipping route to any of the over 10,000 possible destinations. And to make sure you get a road devoid of inconvenience, A-CAR Mobile shows you the map vignette control cameras and fixed cameras and mobile application introduced by other users. They should thank them for the job and believe you can do it simply by adding your turn other temporary alerts when you're on the road and meet a similar situation! Details on www.a-car.ro

NESTOR helps you discover all Quebec's regions and its well-known terroir on your mobile device. The "WHAT TO DO?" functionality suggests a complete list of attractions according to your situation (in family, in couple, alone or among friends), what you want to do, as well your location. Be ready to conquer the various parts of the province and know all the best kept secrets ... until now. You can also prepare your own itinerary easily by selecting attractions before departure. During your getaways, become an ambassador by sharing your Favourites directly via your social networks. In this application, you will find a variety of themes such as: - Terroir Alcohols - Sports & Outdoors - Activities - Local shops (and public markets) - Culture & Heritage - U-pick fruits and vegetables - Restaurants - Lodging - ... And a host of other ideas! NESTOR is also concerned for your internet package. The application gives you the option to choose between offline (operates without internet connection) or online maps and provides you more geolocated access for all its content (in both cases). NESTOR is us, it's you, it's the entire Quebec! To fully enjoy all Quebec's richness, download your personal tour guide, Nestor – Tourisme au Québec.
release_text: - Addition of 15,000 tourist attractions - Now covering all Quebec's regions - Addition of English language - Tablet friendly layout - Completely new interface and design

Throw away your sketchbook! With an endless supply of tools and a simplified, customizable interface, you'll only be limited by your imagination. Unlockable features: - 100+ natural brushes - Create brushes from your own images - Redesigned interface: simple, clean, and consolidated - Layer support with 21 blend modes - Paper backgrounds that interact with brushes - 4 types of symmetry: Horizontal, Vertical, Radial, and Kaleidoscopic - A multitude of guides: Line, Ellipse, Focal, Protractor, Curve, Lazy, French Curves - 5 perspective guides: 1 point, 2 point, 3 point, Curvilinear, and Isometric - Organized workflows: Paint, Clone, Edit, and Select - A library of adjustments, photo filters, and artistic filters - Pattern tools: Fan, Quilt, Path, or Tile - Selection masks - Transform: translate, scale, rotate, flip, distort, and skew - Blend and smudge paint - Pressure-sensitivity and stylus support - Trace, rub and clone images - Import images from your camera, gallery, or from the web - Search millions of colors, palettes and patterns via ColourLovers - Gradient and pattern fills - Rotate and flip the canvas - Reference images - Export images as JPEG, PNG, or PSD - Turn any image into a painting with Live filters - Full interactive Classroom. Watch videos and read articles. - NVIDIA DirectStylus support - Optimized for the Wacom Cintiq Companion Hybrid and other stylus devices, assign functions for the finger, the stylus, and for the hardware

description: Easily share apps with your friends with just the click of a button. Also select multiple apps to share all at once! Also supports backing up your apps to the SD card!. Easily rebuild or transfer apps from one phone to the other! • Quickly uninstall app • Easily launch app • Share single or multiple app market links • Share app .apk files • View details about an app • Link to the Android Market Page of an app • Search for apps by key words • Organize search results by downloaded apps, system apps, and unlaunchable apps (themes, addons, etc).. • Create shortcuts on desktop to launch apps • Backup apps to SD card • Re-install apps This app focuses on convinces and simplicity. It is not intended for root users or advanced users. Apps that are write protected cannot be copied off the device and additionally cannot be shared or have a backup created. ================================================================================= We love to hear from our users! Our Apps thrive on suggestions and feedback from our users. We will make every attempt to respond to comments in the Google Play Market, but for a faster and more personal approach feel free to email us at feedback@skytrait.com . If you have any questions about this app, please first visit our FAQ page. If you still cannot find the answer to your question feel free to send us an email. FAQ Page: http://skytrait.com/mad/android/app_share/faq/faq.html Support Email: support@skytrait.com ================================================================================= PERMISSIONS: BILLING - This permission is used to make in app purchases from within the app. Purchases are not necessary for the app to function, they only extend the available features. More information can be found at http://developer.android.com/google/play/billing/billing_integrate.html INTERNET - This permission is used in Google Play Services. More information on Google Play Service can be found at https://developer.android.com/google/play-services/index.html?hl=en-US ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - This permission is used to determine if the device is currently connected to a mobile data or WiFi source. Helps conserve data and prevents errors. READ_PHONE_STATE/GET_ACCOUNTS - Both permissions are used to verify in app purchases. This allows us to restore purchases after a reinstall or if switching devices. No personal information is ever accessed without consent. More information can be found in our privacy policy at http://www.skytrait.com/privacy_policy.html READ/WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Both permissions are used to write backup files to the SD card and restore them later. INSTALL_SHORTCUT - This permission is used to create shortcuts to applications on the launcher.

description: Yes, you are right! It's the very talking hamster that trolls policeman! A small talking hamster is not only a cool pal in your phone but also a true assistant. Do I have anything in my teeth? Is my hair ok? How's my makeup? Check My Mirror Mirror! My Mirror Mirror uses the front facing camera on your phone as a mirror to show you what you really look like! Stop trying to make out your appearance using the reflection from the black screen after you lock your phone, use My Mirror Mirror instead! description: Covered in the Wall Street Journal! Use blue light therapy to gently lull yourself to sleep naturally and safely. Blue light has been shown to help reset the body's Circadian rhythm. This silent sleep aid works by gently projecting soft blue light onto your wall or ceiling, guiding your breathing to a quick and restful sleep, and in the morning replace your coffee with a blue light sunrise! The illumination rises and falls over a customizable time period slowing and dimming to a gradual power-off. The cycling encourages breathing patterns that lead to a faster more relaxing night's sleep. Spending time indoors surrounded by white artificial light can disrupts the body's natural sleep/wake cycle known as the Circadian rhythm. Aging only exacerbates the problem. But research has shown that the use of blue light before bed and upon rising can promote the reset of your body's Circadian rhythm, necessary to sleep through the night and ward off Seasonal Affective Disorder. Help your baby sleep through the night. Blue light, timed before bed and upon waking, has even been shown to help regulate the sleep cycle for infants and toddlers. Get over jet lag faster! Jet Lag is the body's response to confusing Circadian cues. Reset this and get to sleep faster by using Blue Sleep Therapy in the morning and night! Multiple 1-button preset routines can be used in the morning or before bed, and, unlike white noise machines, this silent app's soft blue tones won't disturb a sleeping partner. Standalone products offering similar features have been referenced in health magazines, news reports and books such as the "The 4 Hour Body", but these products are hardly affordable, often reaching prices of $50 - $150. This app replaces those products while offering customization and timely updates. Interface optimized for screens of all sizes including Android Tablets such as the Motorola Xoom, Acer Iconia and Galaxy Tab. This app requires an internet connection to collect and report usage analytics using Flurry. No personal information is collected, the data is used by us to improve it based on popular usage. While coached breathing techniques are widely accepted and used to help a person relax and enter a restful state, the research on Blue Light therapy is incomplete, and there are conflicting opinions on it, so we provide a selection of articles written for the layperson supporting the use of lighting and breathing cycles to help sleep: References: National Institute of Health - http://ehp03.niehs.nih.gov/article/info:doi%2F10.1289%2Fehp.118-a22 Lighting Research Council - http://www.lrc.rpi.edu/resources/news/enews/Apr05/general245.html EmaxHealth.com - http://www.emaxhealth.com/1020/46/31432/blue-light-system-device-may-help-elders-sleep.html Mark's Daily Apple - http://www.marksdailyapple.com/how-light-affects-our-sleep/ Daily Mail UK - http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-1193226/Specs-shine-blue-light-eyes-good-nights-sleep.html Criticism: LA Times - http://articles.latimes.com/2011/aug/29/health/la-he-skeptic-nightwave-20110829

description: Gun Hockey is a new air hockey type game with a twist! Shoot the puck into the other player’s goal using 4 different weapons: Pistol, Uzi, Shotgun, and Sniper Rifle. With limited ammo, competitive reload times and a unique aiming system, this is a fast paced game of strategy, reflexes and precision. Realistic physics, powered by Box2d, ensure no two games are the same. Bullet ricochets and collisions impact every game, and leftover bullet debris can be used as a tactical advantage. Play against the computer or a friend in a 1v1 match on the same device, or play against yourself for a time trial high score. This game is powered by AndEngine. Optimized and improved gameplay on tablets like the Motorola Xoom, Acer Iconia, Galaxy Tab, Asus Eee Transformer, Nexus 7, Nexus 10 Features: - 4 different, balanced guns to use - Difficulty adjusts to your skill level (losing games -> easier, winning games -> harder) - Solo and 2 player modes - Realistic physics - Unique, intuitive aiming system - High score tracking in solo play Keywords: gun, hockey, crossfire, pistol, uzi, shotgun, sniper, rifle, andengine, box2d, air hockey, 2 player, two player, hackey sack, physics, glow hockey, reactor, xfire
release_text: Sprite artifacts bug fix Upgraded to latest AndEngine game engine Upgraded to latest Android framework

description: Brazil 2014 World Cup app gives latest news update of world cup matches, players to watch, how the teams qualified, fixtures and results, the friendly matches, group stages, quarter final, semi final and final match. You also get news on the completion of the venues, fun areas in the hosting city, review of participating countries, places to avoid and many more. Basically, it gives information of all teams involved in the world cup, from European teams (Spain, Germany, Netherlands), to Africa (Ghana, Nigeria, Algeria), Asia (Australia, Japan), Oceanic (New Zealand), North and Central America (USA, Mexico) and then the mighty South Americans (Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay). Expect to be bombarded with lots of information as well as reviews and count down. What more can I say but to enjoy this free app.

Here it is! Finally! Five in one - puzzle games of the Blocks series: Tower, Destructor, Levels, Rectangles and Shooter gathered in one place. One app = five amazing free puzzle games! Choose the game you are currently fancy on. Every game in the Blocks series is suitable for children and adults. Basic rules for each of this puzzle games are similar: you earn points by removing blocks of the same color. Detailed rules for each game are different: Blocks Tower - the more blocks of the same color you clear at once, the more points you earn. There are new blocks appearing at the top. Blocks Remover - after removing the blocks, new blocks do not appear. The less blocks remains at the end of the game, the better result. Your goal is to clear the whole board. Blocks Levels - blocks differ not only in color but also in shape. 9 types of blocks form levels. Your task is to discover the rules of the levels and score as many points as You can. Blocks Rectangles - You have to find and select four blocks of the same color which form a rectangle. Do it as fast as you can - time is running out. Blocks Shooter - reflex, accuracy and strategy is what really matters in this game. Your bullets are blocks of different colors, Your aim is the row of blocks on top of the board. If you shoot well, blocks of the same color will disappear and you earn points. Do not let the blocks to reach the bottom of the board. Each of the game included in this fantastic four-pack develops logical thinking and perception of children and adults. With these puzzle games You don't need to be afraid of boredom. Download for free, set new records and have fun! :) Check out the detailed information about games included in Blocks! All in one: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.breakcoder.blockslevels https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.breakcoder.blocksremover https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.breakcoder.blockscascade https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.breakcoder.blocksrectangles https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.breakcoder.blocksshooter

description: The Volleyball Scoreboard is a very useful application which allows You keep track of sets and points of the volleyball game. Volleyball scoreboard is designed for classic volleyball and beach volleyball. The application is very simple (intuitive) and customizable. Basic features: You can enter the names of the teams playing the game. You can set the number of point in the set and the number of sets to win. If You set "Beach Volleyball" mode, volleyball scoreboard will remind You to switch sides after each 7 points. Touching the screen of Your phone / tablet adds a point. If you make a mistake, using a special button you can subtract a point. After changing the fields, you can also swap sides of the teams on the scoreboard. You can count time-outs taken by the teams during the match. The app measures the time of each set. When the match is over, you can send the result via email, text message, or by BlueTooth You can also share it on social network sites. Volleyball is under control now. Free volleyball scoreboard for you.
release_text: ver 1.1: "Beach Volleyball" mode - which reminds You to switch sides after each 7 points and can automatically switch sides on the scoreboard. ver 1.2: Bugfix "Share detailed scores"

Access our entire catalog, reserve and renew books, find branches and connect with us through Facebook and Twitter.

Download the hclib.org app and Check My Account – renew items, review holds Search our catalog, place requests and discover new and recommended books Find author talks and other library events Get branch locations, hours and directions Get help via phone, chat or email Connect to us on social networks like Facebook and Twitter. Get the Los Angeles Public Library to go! Search the catalog and photos, hold and renew books, find a library, and more. Features a search designed for mobile devices: Just type in the beginning of the words in your search. To search for "Robert Lewis Stevenson", all you need to type is "rob lew ste", and results display!

Access the Mid-Continent Public Library from your Android device! The mymcpl app makes it easy to discover library materials, place holds, view your account, find your local branch, and keep up with all the events at any MCPL location! Mid-Continent Public Library has over 30 locations in the Greater Kansas City Metro Area. Features: * Discover books, movies, music, and more in our online catalog. * Check our calendar for storytimes, classes, and events for all ages. * Access hundreds of research databases for school, work, and play. * Read updated Library news. * Check out Library materials directly from the shelf. * Find MCPL locations, hours, and maps. * View any charges, fees, or fines. * Renew items. * Use our Ask a Librarian service to receive quick answers. * Scan an item’s ISBN and receive details and reviews of any book, CD, or DVD. * Place holds on current and soon to be released titles. * Search the collection by title, author, subject, or keyword. * Check a title’s availability and current location. * Manage, cancel, and suspend holds. * Browse reading lists and new materials. * Contact Library staff. Mid-Continent Public Library is the largest library system in the metropolitan area, operating 33 libraries and serving over 750,000 people in Jackson, Clay, and Platte counties. The Library strives to provide exceptional customer service and expanding access to materials, programs, and technology including a world class genealogy and family history library. For more information, visit mymcpl.org. For app concerns, problems, feedback, and questions please contact the Library at info@mymcpl.org .

Finding information is faster with Tulsa City-County Library’s mobile, instant access gateway. From library locations and hours to a world of electronic book downloads, we now provide the information anytime you need. Convenience is the key to connecting with a librarian, searching the library catalog, downloading the latest bestseller and sharing your insight with other readers. Join the library’s mobile community to follow the latest trending book topics in your area. Results for books, DVDs, audiobooks, CDs, periodicals and library events are available instantly. Renew items or place holds on your next library checkout and have it sent to the library of your convenience. Learn recommendations on what to read next from TCCL librarians at the forefront of information and publishing industries. Text a librarian your questions for quick answers with cited references. As information providers, our goal is to provide accurate and timely answers. Our newest mobile outreach is a tool that connects Tulsa’s community of library customers with a world of information.

Library Now lets you locate and search your library catalog wherever you are. Locate books, movies, music and more with easy search features designed for mobile devices. Searching the catalog is easy! Just type in the first few letters of the words in your search. For example, to search for "Mark Twain", just type "ma twa." Use Library Now to do the following: Find your local library: * Get library hours and phone numbers. * Map library locations and directions. * Discover library events: * Search for events at any or all libraries. * Search by audience, language and type of event. * Browse featured programs. Access the entire library catalog: * Search for books, movies and music and more. * Place holds if you have a library card With a library card you can manage your account: * Check the status of your holds. * Cancel holds. * Check due dates. * Renew items. * View your account balance.

Choose 2012 is your 2012 United States Presidential Election headquarters on Android. One of the goals of this app is to take a vote from the Android user base to see who you think should be our next President. So once you've made your informed decision, check the box and press the vote button! Then follow along with the results on the Results page which is updated every 15 minutes. This new app will also be your single source for up-to-the-minute information on the 2012 Presidential candidates: President Barack Obama, Mitt Romney, Joe Biden, Gary Johnson, Jill Stein, and Virgil Goode. Use Choose 2012 to learn about each candidate, read their latest news, follow them on social media channels and visit their websites. Choose 2012 provides easy access to the candidates’ social networking sites including twitter, facebook, youtube, flickr, and google plus. It also includes quick links to relevant support pages such as donations and events. And you can visit The Pulse for breaking news articles involving candidates and the polls. Planned Features *Poll Incorporation *Campaign Finance data *Tablet UI *Twitter integration (tweet, retweet, follow without leaving app) *Issues and being able to compare/contrast candidate stances on issues *Party Information This is a first release so please contact me through the app or at support@brennasoft.com with any issues or feature requests. Permissions *Internet - to pull the data *Access Network State - used by Google Analytics (can be disabled in settings) *Write External Storate - used to cache images

description: Update: I am aware of the issue with Swipe Launcher launching when clicking on the Google Now Widget. it's a bug with Google Search and I have reported it to Google. It would help if you would do the same via the feedback tool in Google Now. Thanks! Use Swipe Launcher as a supplement to your existing Launcher. Swipe Launcher replaces the up swipe from home gesture on Android 4.1 JellyBean and lets you customize which app launches with that gesture. Extend Android and add multiple applications to your swipe up action. Easily access multiple applications including Google Now/Search. Limited to 2 applications in addition to Google Search but upgradeable to unlimited with an easy in-app purchase. The in-app upgrade also allows you to change the swipe gesture to launch a specific app.
release_text: Fixed crash on upgrade attempt from Settings. Update to latest API. Added internet permission for crash reporting.

description: QuickTweets for DashClock (formerly known as DashClock Twitter Extension) is a Twitter based extension for DashClock Widget. It displays the latest tweets/direct messages that are sent to you or it shows the latest tweets from a specified twitter account. Currently tweets/dms from the last 2 hours are displayed. In the future I plan to make this a configurable setting. QuickTweets requires DashClock Widget by Roman Nurik: http://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock Notes: The twitter api requires you to login in to Twitter even if you only want to see public tweets from other accounts. Please make sure that you login through the extension settings. Currently when configured to display your tweets, it only displays tweets(mentions) or DMs from other users that have been sent to you. Future Features Option to only show tweets since the last update More configuration options for display and actions Choice of Twitter app to open
release_text: v1.0.4 Added preference to configure what shows (tweets, mentions, dms) Added Changelog v1.0.3 Renamed app to QuickTweets. Reduced app size. Fixed todays issue with DMs not displaying and causing crashes. Added twitter timeline. Added About page.

description: Brewer’s Friend - beer brewing resources for the home brewer of any level. Most complete and accurate brewing tools available online. Fellow home brewers, please enjoy our free mobile app which contains 15 stand alone brewing calculators, a summary of our blog, and links to our cloud based brewing solution. Now you can keep Brewer’s Friend on your home screen and quickly get to the brewing tools you love! Note: this free app does not contain a full beer recipe designer. However, the cloud tab contains a link to our online recipe designer, which is designed to work on mobile phones and tablets. The Brewer’s Friend free mobile app contains the following brewing calculators: ABV Calculator - Alcohol IBU Calculator - Bitterness SRM Calculator - Color All Grain OG/FG Brewhouse Efficiency Mash Calculator Quick Infusion Calculator Extract OG/FG Dilution and Boil Off Hydrometer Temperature Bottling Calculator Priming Sugar Calculator Keg PSI Calculator Wine Brix and SG Calculator Wine Chaptalization Calculator Full support for metric units! The app connects to the internet only to refresh the blog tab content from our RSS feed. When you click a blog post or cloud link you are taken to the Brewer’s Friend website.
release_text: Calculators look better on larger devices.

description: The Brewing Assistant from Brewology101.com is an app for assisting in the brewing of your beer. It helps you build your own recipes by calculating your recipe's IBUs, SRM, OG, FG, and ABV while you build your recipe. Both US customary and metric are supported. The Brewing Assistant will also synchronize your recipes to the Brewology101.com Ale Abacus where you can then edit and delete your recipes or create new recipes. With the ability to sync your recipes to Brewology101.com, you can share your recipes with your friends, family, or the entire internet. It also allows you to backup all your recipes and transfer them to the other Android and iOS devices. To import your recipes into the Brewing Assistant from BeerXML, please import the recipes on Brewology101.com. Then to get the recipes to the Brewing Assistant, all you have to do is perform a sync. No need to manually enter all your recipes into your phone or tablet. Once you're ready to brew, the Brewing Assistant will help you with your mash and your boil. The mash reminder will alert you to stir your mash at the interval you set in the Settings. The boil reminder will alert you to add your ingredients at the times you specified in your recipe. The Brewing Assistant is just the help you need for making your homebrew a success. If you find any errors or have suggestions, please let us know at BrewingAssistant@brewology101.com
release_text: Bug fixes for decimal issues on some devices.

description: Bria Android Smartphone Edition is an award-winning SIP-based softphone – brought to you by CounterPath Corporation, the market leader of VoIP software products and solutions. IMPORTANT NOTE: Bria is a standalone softphone and not a VoIP service. A SIP server or subscription with a SIP-based VoIP provider is required to make calls. HIGHLIGHTS • Highly secure, SIP-based softphone with exceptional voice quality • Purchase in-app Premium Features like Video Calls, Presence and Messaging or audio codecs to enhance your mobile softphone experience • Pre-defined VoIP and XMPP provider list available when adding new accounts , including Facebook and Gmail for XMPP • Integration with Facebook to display contacts' latest Facebook status • Multitasking support for background operation, such as fielding incoming calls while using other applications • HD audio codecs including G.722, OPUS and SILK • Supported accessories include headsets and headphones. Bluetooth™ support is dependent on Android device and operating system • Available in the following languages: English, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), French, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish. • Winner of the 2011 Product of the Year Award from Communications Solutions. For the full list, see http://www.counterpath.com/awards.html STANDARD PHONE FEATURES • Multiple account support for up to 12 accounts on any SIP-compliant server • Contact List leveraging the device’s native contact directory • Call display and voicemail indicator • Speakerphone, mute and hold functions • Call history with a list of received, missed and dialed calls • Call recording • Ringtones and contact avatars • Dial plan support • Multiple call support – swap between two active calls, merge and split calls, transfer calls (attended and unattended) • Audio codecs include G.711a/u, G.722(HD), iLBC, GSM, OPUS and SILK • Automatic codec selection to ensure optimal call quality • Support for DTMF: the ability to enter numbers to use an auto attendant via RFC 2833, SIP INFO and in-band • VPN support • Advanced settings that enable users to control network traversal and media options • Security and encryption via TLS and SRTP • DNS SRV record lookups and call quality statistics PREMIUM FEATURES – OPTIONAL IN-APP PURCHASE • Messaging and Presence – with XMPP and SIP SIMPLE support • Video Calls – using H.264 and VP8 video codecs • G.729 Audio Codec • AMR-Wideband Audio Codec For more information on Bria Android Edition’s features, please visit: http://www.counterpath.com/bria-android-edition.html IMPORTANT VOIP OVER MOBILE/CELLULAR DATA NOTICE Some mobile network operators may prohibit or restrict the use of VoIP functionality over their network and may also impose additional fees, or other charges in connection with VoIP. You agree to learn and abide by your cellular carrier's network restrictions. CounterPath Corporation will not be held liable for any charges, fees or liability imposed by your carrier for use of VoIP over Mobile/Cellular Data. Emergency Calls CounterPath's Bria mobile products provide handling designed to redirect emergency calls to the Native Cellular Dialer when possible on a best reasonable commercial efforts basis, however this functionality is also dependent on the operating system of the mobile phone which is outside of our control and subject to change at any time. As a result, the official position of CounterPath is that CounterPath’s Bria product is not intended, designed, or fit for placing, carrying or supporting Emergency Calls. CounterPath will not be liable for any costs or damages arising either directly or indirectly from the use of the software for Emergency Calls. Using Bria as a default dialer may interfere with dialing emergency services.
release_text: New in Bria Android Smartphone Edition 3.2.1 vCard Photo support bug fix Additional stability and performance improvements If you have an Intel processor device and are experiencing issues making calls, please open a ticket on support.counterpath.com or email us at bria.android@counterpath.com as we'd like to work with you to resolve the issue. Thanks, CounterPath

description: Bria Stretto™ for Android Tablet is a VoIP softphone explicitly tied to CounterPath's Stretto Platform™ and requires an administrator generated account for login. If you do not have an account given to you by your company, operator or CounterPath, you will not be able to use the softphone client. Bria Stretto™ for Android Tablet is based on CounterPath’s award-winning Bria softphone clients and is provisioned by a module of the Stretto Platform. The Stretto Platform’s Provisioning Module is a powerful way for enterprises and operators to distribute, configure and manage Bria softphones and enables users to store their softphone related settings a single, convenient location. With the Provisioning Module, customers can fully provision their Bria softphones for use with their enterprise, SMB, ITSP, or operator VoIP solution. For more information on Bria Android Tablet Edition, please visit: http://www.counterpath.com/bria-android-tablet-edition/ For more information on CounterPath’s Provisioning Module, please visit: http://www.counterpath.com/stretto/ IMPORTANT NOTE: This version of Bria is tied to CounterPath's hosted Provisioning Module and requires an account set up by your operator or enterprise. Without an account, the client will not work. Please contact CounterPath or your operator/company for more information. Emergency Calls CounterPath's Bria mobile products provide handling designed to redirect emergency calls to the Native Cellular dialer when possible on a best reasonable commercial efforts basis, however this functionality is also dependent on the operating system of the mobile phone which is outside of our control and subject to change at any time. As a result, the official position of CounterPath is that CounterPath's Bria product is not intended, designed, or fit for placing, carrying or supporting Emergency Calls. CounterPath will not be liable for any costs or damages arising either directly nor indirectly from the use of the software for Emergency Calls. Using Bria as a default dialer may interfere with dialing emergency services.

description: Cleaning running applications. Making your android phone speed up and saving battery! support android 1.5 and up. HOW TO USE -------------------------------------- It's Pretty simple:-) 1.Launch this application and take a look at the running applications list, uncheck some applications you don't want to kill (Such as some system applications). Tap the button "End Task", it will kill all applications checked. 2.Tap app item to kill/switch/uninstall/detail. 3.Long Press app item to add/remove ignore list,add/remove auto-kill,manage auto-kill list. 4.Enable the Auto-kill Setting ,if you want to auto-kill running apps. 5.If force close,send bug report by menu->prefrence->Bug Report. 6.Long press to add task clean widget on home screen. NOTICE -------------------------------------- 1.Make the show ignore app setting checked, the ignore app will be displayed in main view. 2.The Startup clean scale is same as Widget's kill all apps. Actually it means kill all tasks which exclude ignore list and some system required tasks. 3.If Widget Press Action has been changed ,please remove the widget from Home Screen and add it again! 4.Hide the Notification message when the phone screen is from off to on and no task to kill. 5.When AutoStart type is Run in Background, means that TaskCleaner will run in background when reboot. 6.If you pressed Menu->Completely Exit, all function will be stop except widget. 7.You can add widget to clean task by scale mode or set different apps to be killed at different times using the interval options! NOTES -------------------------------------- 1.Auto-killer only kills tasks in this auto-kill list.Be careful on what you intend to insert in the auto-kill list. 2.this auto-kill function runs when the screen goes off or enters sleep mode. 3.Interval Auto-kill Service auto-kill tasks by interval mode. Set the interval of auto-kill in auto-kill list view. 4.When first init this app,Message,Gmail,Home will be auto added to the ignore list. 5.About widget,You can change Widget Press Action from Menu->Preference->Widget Setting. 6..If Message app is killed,you don't show notification any more when new message arrived.Be care of this please! KW: taskiller Task killer taskmanager taskpanel process uninstall task process release memory save battery kill app task panel manager panel system app memory ATK. Enable show system app setting to see more running app.

Ready to take your game to the next level? We hope so—because Shootout is back. The updated version of the #1 lacrosse game is loaded up with new Brine gear and high-resolution graphics. And with a brutal new All-Star level to test you, this Shootout isn’t just better. It’s meaner. ACCLAIM FOR SHOOTOUT “Overall, I believe Shootout is a welcome addition to the lives of lacrosse players, and I love that this forward-thinking innovation came from a company founded way back in 1922. Brine Lacrosse continues to lead the way!” – Krieg Shaw, laxallstars.com “It is an addictive game, and a necessary download for all LAX fans from 8-88.” – Andrew Weiner, examiner.com “Brine Shootout… easily the best app ever.” – @RealSammyP_03 “Loving the Brine Shootout app.” – @revED_up “Brine Shootout. All day everyday. #addicted” – @TabbiLevengood “They finally made a lacrosse game app. Clearly my prayers have been answered.” – @caaitlynalexis “Playing Brine Shootout instead of paying attention in class.” – @RyanStrangland FEATURES ☆ Total control over your shots: Whip one in over the goalie’s shoulder, bounce one off the ground through traffic—even go five-hole if you’re really feeling it. Or just unleash a Power Shot to knock over every unlucky defender in your way. ☆ Five increasingly tough levels to tackle: Backyard, High School, College, Pro, and new All-Star. ☆ A full arsenal of unlockable Brine gear helps you up your game—and your scores. ☆ A built-in, worldwide leaderboard lets you see how you measure up to the best (or don’t). ☆ Really light it up? Share your score on Facebook & Twitter—and dare others to beat it. ☆ Made, tested, and played by the brand that’s been a leader in lacrosse since 1922. HOW TO PLAY ☆ Once the whistle blows, simply flick up to shoot. Flick direction, speed and distance all have an impact on the placement of your shot. ☆ To keep the clock going, keep scoring. Once you’ve scored three goals in a row, every goal adds :01 to your time; once you’ve hit 10 in a row, that bonus doubles to :02. Until you miss—then you’re back to square one. ☆ At the bottom-left corner of the screen is your power meter. Every goal and defender you knock down helps fill this up. When it’s completely full, you can perform a Power Shot. ☆ To perform a Power Shot, simply flick down then up—similar to how you’d draw a checkmark. ☆ Power Shots can knock over defenders. Each defender you knock down will give you a time bonus that matches what you’re currently receiving for goals (if you’re in the middle of a 10+ goal streak, for example, you’ll get :02 for every defender you knock down).
release_text: NEW IN VERSION 2.0 ☆ Bug fixes—including the dreaded “Ground Ball of Death” ☆ Better gear: Clutch Elite Head and Swizzbeat Handle ☆ An intense new All-Star level ☆ Updated graphics for high-resolution phones and tablets ☆ Connect and share your victories on Twitter

description: Do you like listening to and reading stories? There are lots and lots of great animated stories here for you to watch and listen to. Aimed at children who are learning English as a second or foreign language, LearnEnglish Kids: Videos provides ten fun videos to enjoy. Stories include: * Goldilocks and the Three Bears * Jack and the Beanstalk * Little Red Riding Hood * Dark Dark Wood * The Monster Shopping Trip * Record Breakers and many more. Includes a parents' guide with information on how best to help your child learn English. Get more great content at http://learnenglishkids.britishcouncil.org/

The verbal sections of the GRE or SAT giving you a hard time? Do you want to improve your English vocabulary? This is the app for you! Containing a word list of 3723 words, with example sentences, this app will make your life a whole lot fun, while learning new words. Words are also provided with their pronunciations if you wish to hear how they are pronounced (requires internet access). Contains 3 mediums for studying: the learning sessions, the word list and flash cards. The learning sessions are where the core gameplay lies. The learning sessions provide you with a list of words to study in that session and they test you progressively. You will receive the words with their definitions and example sentences. Then you will be asked to match the meaning of the given word, then be given the meaning of the word and you will be prompted to select the word, then a sentence will be given and you will be required to fill in the blank by selecting the proper word (just like in the SAT or GRE!) and you may be required to spell the word, when given its meaning. Be careful as these phases are timed! The words you have completed will come up regularly after some time for you to review them and not forget them. Once you reach a high enough streak of correct answers, or you attain a high performance with a word, that word will be "mastered". Mastered words will not appear as frequent as other words for review. The sessions end by a matching game of all words studied in the session. In the word list you can see the list of words available in your app. The words are grouped alphabetically for easy access. You can select a word to see the details for that word. If you long-click a word you can see the options you have for that word such as: the history of that word (how many times you have studied it, your current performance), or you can choose to set the word as "mastered" or "known". "Known" words will never come up in learning sessions, unless you "prioritize" them. "Prioritization" allows you to choose the words that you want to study in the next sessions! By pressing the menu button on your device and selecting "Multiple Words", you can select and handle many words at once. You can also deprioritize words or change their orders as well after you have prioritized them! The flash cards allow you to study words one by one. You can study words that have already appeared in the learning sessions or all words. This is my very first app. I hope you like it. Feel free to send me comments, upgrades, thoughts, anything that you would like to see on this app, through the contact page of the app or by the e-mail given below. Enjoy!
release_text: - Ability to add and delete words added. You may also reset the word list if you accidentally delete words, or just want them back. - Bug fixes especially regarding the sessions.

description: It's Airplay functionality for your Android TV! Stream music, videos and pictures from your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch and iTunes directly to your TV. Notes: - Mirroring is not supported (yet) - Movies protected by DRM (such as most movies purchased from iTunes) are not supported - Futures versions of Apple's software may disable this app Try our app: If you don't like it, contact us for a refund within 30 days. === How to Use === Assuming that both your Android TV and iOS device are on the same network: 1. Open a video on your iOS device (don't have one handy? try a podcast) 2. You will notice a new icon next to the play/pause/next buttons (if not, swipe up from the bottom of the screen to access Airplay) 3. Tap it and select the Android TV. It should start playing Follow us... Twitter: http://twitter.com/YossieTV Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/116958013910244535703 And remember: if something isn't working right, please contact us. We'll be glad to help. This app is not affiliated with Apple in any way.

description: Catch the butterflies before they fly away! This fun math game for kids is an exciting way to learn addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division math facts and to improve math fluency skills. Beautiful butterflies flutter while you quickly solve the math problem before time runs out! After completing a level, catch the butterflies, but watch out for the bees! As you successfully pass levels, the math problems increase in difficulty and new types of butterflies appear. The free version lets you play the first two levels. This math game for kids makes math fun and avoids boring math drills. Mixes game play and beautiful graphics with education! Features: - addition, multiplication, subtraction, division - timed or untimed problem solving - no ads or tracking of user information - after second level user asked yes/no to purchase full version - grades: first grade, second grade, third grade, fourth grade Topics: addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, math, practice math flash cards, math problems, education, educational, math game, kids math, educational games, math quiz, flashcards, math facts, grade, games, boys, girls, kids, math apps, first, second, third, fourth

Attention All Passengers! Board the plane and begin your quest! With Geometry Quest you travel the world solving geometry problems that increase in difficulty with each city. Be careful not to lose all of your passports or you will have to revisit the city to gain more knowledge. Your worldly adventure will cover geometry concepts such as categorization of shapes, area, perimeter, lines, types of angles, angle measurement, volume, circumference, coordinates, symmetry and the Pythagorean Theorem. In this light version of the game you can visit the first city! Bugaboo Math Games wishes you a safe and educational journey! • Animated character gives hints on solving problems • Passport stamps awarded for perfect quests • Successfully solving a city unlocks the next city on the map • Covers Common Core Standards: 3MD, 3G, 4MD, 4G, 5MD, 5G, 6G, 7G, 8G • No ads • No in-app purchases or links to the web The topics covered in this geometry app include: Pythagorean's theorem, angles, shapes, area, volume, perimeter, circumference, coordinates, isosceles triangles, concrugent triangles, lines of symmetry, parallel lines crossed by a transversal, slope.
Mobile app for Ummaland - Social Network for Muslims
