As Jay Bush, the protector of BUSH’S® Secret Family Recipe, our running game will have you dashing through the Bush’s family farm collecting beans and ingredients to make all of your favorite BUSH’S® Baked Bean flavors. Bush’s Bean Dash is packed with power-ups to help you through our run and jump platform game as you do your best to avoid Big Bumbling Bees, Crazy Clucking Chickens and Pesky Gophers. This Bush’s Beans video game features three different endless runner zones of Jay & Duke bean-gathering madness! Features: • Play Jay and Duke Bush’s Video Game from the BUSH’S® Beans TV Commercial! • Bush’s Bean Dash. Easy-to-Learn. Difficult-to-Master. Single-Touch Run and Jump play • All New, Exclusive Jay Bush Voice Clips! • Three Different Zones – The Farm, The Barn & The Countryside • Randomized Retro Arcade Game Style Level Designs • Four Different Power-Ups! • Fly with a Pig! • Drive with Duke! • Make Nine Different BUSH’S® Flavors to Earn Achievements! • NO IN-GAME PURCHASES! Bush’s Bean Dash is completely free to play! Run and jump, fly and drive your way through three different zones of the Bush’s farm as Duke (the family dog) chimes in with advice and words of encouragement along the way. A simple tap will help Jay Bush jump over obstacles and enemies. A double tap will allow you to super-jump and reach higher goals. As Jay runs and jumps, gather as many beans as you can and keep an eye on your bean meter – if it runs out, it’s GAME OVER. At the bottom of the screen, you’ll see the recipe for your current BUSH’S® Baked Beans flavor. Gather all of the ingredients to earn recipe achievements! Share your high score and achievements with your friends through Facebook! (Game DOES NOT automatically post on your behalf. See your settings for details.) Live the dream! Get the beans! Maybe you’ll even learn The Bush’s Baked Beans Secret Family Recipe along the way... Terms & Conditions http://www.bushbeans.com/en_US/terms.jsp

Have fun with your friends monsters in this awesome platformer. Bob is a restless freak and loves to jump from platform to platform, but has a problem: he's afraid of Halloween pumpkins. You have to help you climb to the top of college Monsters collecting hearts, coins and jewelry finding you go along the way. You have three chances but remember that pumpkins can be nervous that Bob! Download this free game for your mobile phone or tablet and you or your children enjoy many hours of entertainment wherever you go.

Have you ever thought about the dangers of being Italian chef? Did you know how violent are the pizzas before cooking? They are very violent and are angry! Hot out of the oven and cook attack. Now you'll find out with this free game for your Android phone or tablet: You Mario Balotelli, cook fashionable for tourists in Rome and your goal is to emerge unscathed from a day's work in your kitchen. Get defend against wild pizzas using kitchen tools you have at your fingertips. Beware, they are violent and olives!

Buycott Barcode Scanner helps you vote with your wallet so you fund causes you care about and avoid funding those you disagree with. Featured as ABC News & Salon.com app of the week. As seen on NBC, FOX, CNBC, MSNBC, and covered by Forbes and Huffington Post. ● HOW IT WORKS ● ✓Join campaigns to help causes you care about and commit to supporting the companies on your side of the issue, while avoiding those that oppose your position. ✓Scan product a product barcode and Buycott will find out what company owns that product (and who owns that company, ad infinitum). ✓Buycott will determine whether you're avoiding or supporting the scanned product. ✓Using this information you can now vote with your wallet ● FEATURES ● ☆ Using the bar code scanner, look up the ownership structure of any product and trace it all the way back to its parent company with our interactive family tree diagram. ☆ Offers a variety of contact data for companies and brands, so you can easily inform them of your decision to support or avoid their products. ☆ Barcode scanner scans all major retail barcodes (UPC-A, UPC-E, EAN8, EAN13, etc). ☆ Super fast barcode scanner ensures you don't spend extra time at the store. ☆ Create your own campaign from buycott.com ☆ Make decisions quickly so you can ultimately vote with your wallet
release_text: -Fixed scanning errors on HTC, Sony and other affected devices. -We've added suggested alternative products, making it for you to discover new products that suit your lifestyle. -Re-designed product page. -Lots of bug fixes. -Bug fixes -Language support for Arabic and Japanese

description: Buy Me a Pie! widget allows you to easily view all of your shopping lists and mark grocery items as purchased without opening the app. It is possible to adjust the widget window size on the screen for your maximum comfort. Please note that the widget works only with the Buy Me a Pie! Pro version. Buy Me a Pie! is the best shopping list for mobile devices that helps users enjoy shopping, save money and even stick to a diet. With Buy Me a Pie! you can share your shopping lists with friends and family and shop together.
release_text: 1.1 ======= * Multiline groceries. 1.0.1 ======= * The problem with connecting to the app is solved.

description: Find amazing deals in electronics, discover latest clothing sales and get the best prices for their daily shopping. BuyVia helps you save and gives you ideas at the same time! It shows you the most recent deals in electronics, clothing, gifts, HDTVs, blu-ray movies, games, groceries, home essentials and many more.. You can like deals and see what other people liked. You can follow friends and get followers that share your deal taste. You will discover new things and get your shopping inspiration from savvy shoppers with similar interests. Discover your deal inspiration and savor the savings with BuyVia Main Features: * Deal alert notifications. BuyVia will notify you as soon as new deals appear (based on your keyword/forum selection). Know about the newest deals first. * Categories. Explore deals in a variety of categories, such as: Games, DVDs, Music, TVs, Computers, Cameras, Apple products, Apps, Clothing, Jewelry, Shoes, Babies, Food, Health, Home & Kitchen, Sports, Travel, Gift Cards and more.... * Widget - enjoy deal updates right on your desktop. * Top Hot deals. See what other people think are the best deals right now. Thumbs up or down the deals you feel strongly about. Your opinion will help the good deals to come to the top. You'll also earn points for your input. People may follow you if they find your deal selection interesting. Your friends will be able to easily find your likes, so that you can comment and discuss them. * Favorites. Save to favorites the deals you love, so that you can easily find them later. * Fast UI. Simple, clean, easy to use and time saving user interface. Only two touches to switch between the deal categories.
release_text: * Support for the new bigger Coupon Database * Enhanced local coupons * Remembering what Category you left off at * Better handling of Barcodes * Sharing of coupons * Performance and User Interface improvements

description: 100만 사용자가 선택한 1등 홈쇼핑 검색서비스 '홈쇼핑모아' (현재 90주 연속 1위) ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ [ 홈쇼핑모아에서만 받을 수 있는 추가 할인/적립 혜택 이벤트 ] - 현대홈쇼핑 : 7% 추가적립 - NS홈쇼핑 TV쇼핑 : 7% 할인 (모바일 첫 구매시) + 7% 추가적립 + 홈쇼핑모아만의 5% 추가적립 - 롯데홈쇼핑 (바로TV) : 7% 추가적립 + 홈쇼핑모아만의 7% 플러스 할인쿠폰 - GS홈쇼핑 (GS Shop) : 5% 추가적립 - CJ오쇼핑 : 5% 추가적립 - 홈&쇼핑 (홈앤쇼핑) : 10% 추가적립 할인쿠폰과 추가적립 제외 상품이 있으니, 자세한 사항은 앱내 공지사항을 참고해주세요. ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ■ 기능 안내 [1] 편성표 - 국내 6개 홈쇼핑방송편성표(방송일정) 한눈에 보기: GS 홈쇼핑 방송편성표(지에스, GS SHOP TV, GS샵), CJ홈쇼핑 방송편성표(CJmall), 롯데홈쇼핑 방송편성표(LOTTE imall), NS홈쇼핑 방송편성표(NSmall, NS 자동주문, 농수산홈쇼핑), 홈앤쇼핑 방송편성표(hnsmall, 홈&쇼핑), 현대홈쇼핑 방송편성표(현대Hmall) - 내가 원하는 홈쇼핑 업체 선택 후 시간표 확인 가능 - 내가 원하는 날짜 선택 후 시간표 확인 가능 - 내가 원하는 상품 카테고리 선택 후 시간표 확인 가능 [2] 상품 - 오늘의 특가상품(홈&쇼핑 핫킬상품, GS홈쇼핑(GS SHOP) 특가딜, CJ 오쇼핑, 오클락, 쿠차 홈쇼핑 특가 상품) 모아보기. (홈쇼핑 업체 상품 외의 상품이 포함되어 있습니다.) - 홈쇼핑 업체의 상품 리스트 모아보기 (시간 정보는 리스트에서 제공되지 않습니다.) - 인기 상품 방송일정/방송편성표를 확인할 수 있는 메뉴. [3] 검색 - 이전 버전과 비교해 대폭 강화된 검색기능 제공 - 검색 키워드 알림 설정 가능 - 6대 홈쇼핑 이전방송, 방송 예정 상품 모두 검색 가능 - 홈앤쇼핑(홈&쇼핑), GS 홈쇼핑(GS SHOP), CJ오쇼핑, 현대홈쇼핑, NS홈쇼핑 인터넷 상품까지 모두 검색 [4] 생방송 - 현재 GS홈쇼핑(GSSHOP TV), CJ홈쇼핑, 롯데홈쇼핑(바로TV), 현대홈쇼핑, 홈앤쇼핑(홈&쇼핑,hnsmall), NS홈쇼핑 등 6개 채널 생방송 실시간 보기 기능 제공 [5] 방송알림 - 상품 상세정보 페이지에서 방송 알림설정 가능 - 푸시 소리알림 설정 가능: 앱 오른쪽 상단의 동그라미 종 아이콘 터치→알림음 설정 메뉴 터치 - 원하는 상품 키워드의 방송알림 등록: 내가 원하는 상품의 키워드(예: 과일)를 알림 설정→해당 키워드가 포함된 상품이 편성표에 등록될 시 방송 알림 푸시메시지 발송 ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ※ 홈쇼핑모아를 통해 홈쇼핑 모바일웹에서 구매한 상품에 대한 결제 문의는 홈쇼핑모아에서 확인 및 처리가 어렵습니다. 이는 6개 홈쇼핑의 개인정보보호 정책 상 결제 정보를 외부 업체에 전달하지 않음과 동시에, 홈쇼핑모아에서는 상품의 정보만 제공하며 결제서비스를 제공하는 것이 아니기 때문에 상품구매에 대한 전적인 책임은 구매자 또는 해당 홈쇼핑 업체에게 있습니다. 따라서 구매 및 결제에 대한 문의는 해당 홈쇼핑 고객센터를 통해 진행 부탁 드립니다. ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ■ Contact - 제휴·광고 및 고객문의: customer@buzzni.com - 홈페이지: http://www.buzzni.com ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ---- 개발자 연락처 : customer@buzzni.com

description: MWC Homepack with Barcelona themed apps/widgets specifically needed for the Mobile World Congress event. The Homepack is themed with wallpapers representing beautiful Barcelona. It accommodates essential apps such as the GSMA official MWC app, NFC badge reader app, and must-have social networking apps such as Linked in, Facebook, and twitter. The Homepack extends its service toward visitors of Barcelona and also provides app shortcuts such as Google translate, Babbel for a conversation app, Trip Advisor for city guide, traffic/transportation applications, and so on. MWC Homepack comes fully loaded with custom designed widgets, dual clocks for keeping track of time, Calendar widgets, and RSS feed widgets to keep up with latest media updates! Regardless of attending the MWC, this homepack contains essential information of Barcelona. So check it out and stay efficient / stylish through the MWC Homepack!

Dots is a logical board game on checked paper. But now your smartphone can serve as a pen and a sheet. Play with gamers from all over the world via online multiplayer! Train with games vs Android! The aim of the game is to hem in maximum dots of the opponent. Players put dots on line crossings on checked paper. Each player puts dots of one color. Dots should be separated by one square only horizontally, vertically, and diagonally. The game is over when there are no free crossings, or upon mutual agreement, or if one of the players surrenders. Dots is a game with creative checked paper graphics, which makes it off-beat and all-time interesting! Features: ONLINE GAME: Play with gamers from all over the world via internet GAME VS ANDROID: Choose your level and try to beat Android GAME VIA BLOETOOTH: Play with friends, colleagues, and any other person via Bluetooth GAME ON ONE DEVICE: Want to play with your friend on one device? No problem! Choose mode “2 players on one device” ACHIEVEMENTS: Hem around the maximum of dots and win to get achievements GLOBAL LEADERBOARD: Become the best "Dots" player playing online ***** It is high time to discover who is the best at "Dots"! ----- * The game is free and with no in-game purchases required.

description: Do you like innovative Action Indie Games? Try Bronko Blue, our new atmospheric side scroller. „Game of the Day: Bronko Blue, the Kitten Copter (...) offers an atmospheric kitty-loving action title, perfect for those really boring commutes" - mobile-ent.biz „Feast your eyes on Bronko Blue, a stylistic new physics sidescroller that blends together the atmospheric action of Limbo with the one touch gameplay of Jetpack Joyride..." - supergamedroid.com „A new Game Bronko Blue the kitten copter will become a new addict.." - applecontroll.com „Just when you thought kittens were calm and boring animals Bronko Blue flips the stereotype..." - androidappdictions.com *** Highlights *** * 100% casual indie game * Simple touch controll * Atmospheric side-scrolling copter action game * Challenging journey through seasons and nightscapes * Physics based world with charming graphics * No In-App Purchase * More worlds and content coming in updates * 4 Worlds (Winter, Spring, Summer, Fall) * shooting, flying blue cat ;-) Bronko Blue, the kitten copter is an atmospheric side scroller. Bronko is a small blue cat who flies through the seasons and nightscapes searching for his lost wool. He must avoid or interact with obstacles along the way. The cat can shoot or ram stone towers or fight against windmills. Birds approach him which Bronko can shoot but not collide with. The missing balls of wool can be found along the way to receive bonus points. Bronko can use a torch to light his way in the dark. Visit us: https://www.facebook.com/bytecombo http://bronko.bytecombo.com/

MAIN FEATURES: - Very Smooth Controls - Facebook Integration - Realistic Sound Effects - Excellent Graphics HOW TO PLAY: - Tilt your device to control the movement of your F-16 fighter plane - Tap on screen anywhere to fire You can share your High-Score on your facebook profile and through leaderboard you can compare your friends score with yours. AudioPlayer is a compact audio player for Android Smartphone/tablet. Playing audio books, classical music or any music of your choice. AudioPlayer is an ideal player, when you wish to organize your audio files in a directory and create your own playlists. AudioPlayer can play audio files compatible with your device. As an indication AudioPlayer plays: MP3, AMR, AAC, PCM WAV, OGG, MP4a, 3GP and playlists done in M3U. AudioPlayer has for devices running Android versions better than 2.3 (GINGERBREAD) audio effects (equalizer, bass boost and stereo widening) are available. AudioPlayer can: - play your own playlists including a shuffle mode. - support for nested playlists (up to 16 levels) - Show ID2V1 and ID3V2 datas (title, artist, album, description). - Show Vorbis comment in FLAC files. - Go back or forward in your lists. - Go forward on a small/medium/large (adjustable) jump along the track. - Play in a loop mode. - Store playback settings when there is a shutdown (playlists, track/chapter, play position, and volume). It starts where you stopped. - Activate a pause mode during in-outgoing calls. - Configure audio effects and store them in presets. AudioPlayer is also available for purchase if you wish an ads free version!

description: The Pillreminder will remind you to take the birth control pill. The App supports three pill types: - 21 days (7 pill free days) - 22 days (6 pill free days) - 28 days (7 days placebo pills) With the calendar view you can swipe through the months and see on which days you have to take the pill, or which days are pill free or placebo pill days. The App is simple to use: Select your pill type, enter the date when you started the current pill stripe and set your remind time. If you want, you can customize the colors used in the App. Keywords: Birth control pill, pill, contraception, sex, medicine, reminder, pillreminder.

A head-up display or heads-up display—also known as a HUD—is any transparent display that presents data without requiring users to look away from their usual viewpoints. The origin of the name stems from a pilot being able to view information with the head positioned "up" and looking forward, instead of angled down looking at lower instruments. This app uses your compass, rotation sensors and GPS to render a head-up display. GPS is used for displaying kilometer per hour on the left side, height in meters above sea level on the right side and time on the bottom of the display. The inclination angle is in degrees. The camera previews always have a little delay, therefore consider this app as a toy. Do not use this as a real head-up display as you might endanger others.

Enjoy the game!

description: When you were younger the crayon was the default coloring choice. Now, that you are older the colored pencil is now king. The evil Colored Pencil King has put a bounty out for any crayons to make sure they never come back again. You are one of the last crayons in this world. Your job is to jump and slide your way in the pencil world. I will be pointed, you cannot touch a sharpened pencil point. How To Play: Once you get the game started, land on the pencils with the erasers while not touching the points. You can jump high, but the world doesn't move fast enough for your to stay alive. So you need to hold your finger to the screen to make your crayon glide! Share your results with friends with online leaderboards. Features: - Endless Play - Fun colorful graphics - Online Leaderboards - Hidden Mode

description: Quick Financial Calculator - It is a very easy to use financial calculator. You can use this calculator to calculate the EMI - Equated Monthly Installments Loan Amount Recurring Deposit Maturity Value. Fixed Deposit Maturity Value. EMI calculator is easy to use and is quick to perform. EMI calculator let's you judge how affordable a loan can be for you. Always use the calculator to get a quick quote on your EMIs. You can calculate home, personal and car loan EMI with this calculator. -Enter the loan amount you wish to avail in the EMI calculator. -Enter the rate of interest (reducing). -Enter the loan tenure (months). Loan Amount Calculator - This calculator is to find the loan amount eligible to you based on the EMI and the interest rate you can afford. -Enter the EMI amount. -Enter the rate of interest (reducing). -Then enter the loan tenure (months). Recurring Deposit Calculator - This Calculator gives you the return on the investment made in monthly installment. The frequency of interest compounding can be monthly, Quarterly, Half Yearly and Yearly. -Enter the Monthly installment -Enter the Interest Rate Offered. -Select the frequency of Compounding. -Enter the Tenure(months) Fixed Deposit Calculator - This calculator can be used to find the maturity value of the principal amount deposited for tenure and interest rate offered. -Enter the Principal Amount -Enter the Interest Rate Offered. -Select the frequency of Compounding. -Enter the Tenure (months)

★ 세가지 계산기 스킨 제공 ★ ( 검정색 하늘색 핑크색 스킨 ) 당신에게 필요한 여러가지 계산기를 한 번에 모아 사용해 보시기 바랍니다. 다양한 어플의 기능이 포함되어 있습니다. 계산기 모음은 다음과 같은 기능을 제공합니다. 1. 일반 계산기 - 간단한 일반 계산기 입니다. 뎃셈, 뺄셈, 곱셉, 나눗셈을 할 수 있습니다. 2. 단위 변환 - 길이, 넓이 , 무게, 부피, 온도, 압력, 속도, 연비, 데이터양 을 변환 할 수 있습니다. 3. 비만도 계산 - BMI 계산을 할 수 있습니다. 4. 할인 계산 - 원가에 대해 할인 금액이 얼마이며, 할인 후 가격은 얼마 인지 알 수 있습니다. 5. 이자 계산 - 적금 , 예금에 대한 이자를 구할 수 있습니다. 단리, 복리 , 일반 세금, 비과세, 세금우대에 대한 계산을 할 수 있습니다. 6. 더치페이 계산 - 간단한 더치페이 계산기 입니다. 100 원 단위로 계산 합니다. 7. 학점 계산 - 4.5 만점의 평균 학점을 계산 합니다. 8. 기념일 계산 - 해당일로 부터 오늘까지 몇 일 인지, 그리고 100일 , 200일 1000일 그 이상의 기념일을 계산해서 그날이 언제 인지 몇일이 남았는지 보여줍니다. 9. 배란일 계산 - 배란일, 임신 가능기간, 다음 생리예정일을 계산합니다. 10. 대출 이자 계산 - 원리금균등상환, 원금균등상환, 원금만기일시상환 지원, 월별 이자 계산 11. 전역일 계산 - 육군, 해군, 공군, 해병, 공익근무요원, 전의경 전역일 계산 12. 날짜 계산 - 몇 일 전, 몇 일 후 날짜 계산 13. 만나이 계산 - 만나이, 나이 계산 14. 연비 계산 - 주유 금액, 주행거리, 주유량으로 연비 계산 15. 진수 변환 - 2진수, 8진수, 10진수, 16진수 변환 지원 만든이 : 변두리 프로그래머 Calculator provides three kinds of skin ★ ★ (Black sky blue pink skin) Please gather at a time using the various calculators you need. Features include a wide range of applications. Provides the following functions: a calculator collection. 1 General Calculator - A simple calculator general. You can detsem, subtraction, multiplication, and division. 2 Unit conversion - can convert speed, the length, width, weight, volume, temperature, pressure, fuel consumption, amount of data. 3 Calculate BMI - BMI can be calculated. You can see how much the discount amount, and discount prices are much aware about the cost - 4 discount calculation. 5 Interest Calculation - Savings, you can get the interest on the deposit. Calculation of compound interest can, in isolation, general tax, tax exemption, tax breaks. 6 Dutch pay calculation is a simple calculator Dutch page. Calculated as unit 100 won.   Calculate the average grade of 4.5 out of - 7 hours calculation. 8 Day calculation - whether from that day until today, a few days, and shows how many days are left when the day is whether to calculate a more anniversary 100 days, 200 days 1000 days.   You can calculate the period of pregnancy, the ovulation, the next menstrual date - September calculate ovulation. 10 loan interest calculation - principal and interest equal repayment, equal principal repayment, repayment of principal at maturity support, monthly interest calculation 11 jeonyeokil calculation - Army, Navy, Air Force, Marines, public service workers, jeonuigyeong jeonyeokil calculation 12 Date calculation - a few days ago, a few days after the calculation date 13 mannayi calculation - mannayi, age calculation Unlimited mileage calculation amount, as mileage, juyuryang-14 fuel calculation 15 hex conversion - binary, octal, decimal, hexadecimal conversion support Created by: outskirts programmer

Упражнения для пресса. Как накачать пресс Подтянутые женщины и мускулистые мужчины с рекламных плакатов и экранов телевизоров предлагают целую кучу средств, как сделать идеальную фигуру с плоским животом, стройными ногами и накаченными мышцами пресса. В этой статье мы, расскажем вам, как быстро и эффективно накачать пресс дома, как убрать живот и сделать его плоским, словно у девушек с плакатов. Итак, если вы решили накачать пресс в домашних условиях, в первую очередь определите дни и время, когда вы делать свою фигуру идеальной. Лучше всего делать упражнения для пресса (как и другие упражнения) утром. Самый оптимальный вариант качать пресс три раза в неделю по часу. Более часто делать упражнения на пресс не над., ведь больше упражнений вовсе не значит, что вы добьётесь красивого пресса быстро и эффективно. Exercises for the abs. How to pump up the press Tightened women and muscular men with billboards and TV screens offer a whole bunch of money, how to make the perfect shape with a flat stomach, slim legs and abdominal muscles pumped. In this article, we will tell you how to quickly and efficiently pump up the press at home, how to remove the stomach and make it flat, like the girls with posters. So, if you decide to pump up the press at home, first determine the days and times when you do your ideal figure. It is best to do exercises for the abs (and other exercises) in the morning. Best option to download the press three times a week for an hour. More often do abdominal exercises is not over. Because more exercise does not mean that you will achieve a beautiful press quickly and efficiently.

description: You can learn Japanese law with this app. This application provides the Compendium of Japanese Laws for Android mobile phone and tablet PC. Users can browse 7713 Japanese laws and regulations including the Constitution of Japan, Acts, Cabinet Orders, Imperial Ordinances, the Cabinet Office Ordinances, and Ministerial Ordinances using the Data Distribution System from the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications. In addition, it has an availability to view on the Rules of Civil Procedure, the Rules of Criminal Procedure, the Rules of Civil Execution and the Rules of Civil Provisional Remedies which is not provided in the Data Distribution System. Since each legal data stored in the SD card, it is also able to viewed offline. Furthermore, it has an easy one-click access to the English version which is from the XML data of Japanese Law Translation Database System sourced from the Ministry of Justice. This application is made ​​for all legal professions. The main function is as follows. Article search, Keyword search Views of English version (partly) You can add almost all the laws and regulations from 7713 Japanese laws and regulations(Japanese only） Making notes on articles Attaching sticky notes Display or non-display setting of laws and regulations and sorting display order Automatic saving of data in SD card Backup and Restore the list of laws you selected We develop not only thinking law practitioner as lawyers, judicial scriveners and administrative scriveners, etc., but also all legal parties such as law students, law school students, students study the judicial examination, and legal apprentices. *In the case not all articles displayed on the screen(displayed halfway), please re-download the relevant laws and regulations in the " laws and regulations setting" (click on the icon of the floppy disk). *If an error is caused by updating, it is recommended to uninstall and re-install. Please notify us the actual situation when an error has occurred. *There is no difference in the function among AndRoppo and AndRoppo Pro. Thank you!

Experience the internet with the speed and simplicity of Lightning Plus, a web browser built to rival the giants. Browse fast on your Android phone or tablet, and see through a portal to infinite information. ● Design - Lightning's interface was carefully crafted so you can browse as efficiently as possible without sacrificing those features that mean the most to you. Tabs and Bookmarks are all tucked neatly away in side drawers, only a swipe away, allowing maximum screen viewing with minimal interference from the browser's chrome. ● Speed - By utilizing the WebKit rendering engine that comes built into your Android device, we can ensure a swift, lightweight experience that won't disappoint. ● Privacy - Use Incognito Mode to browse without leaving a footprint, download Orbot and turn on proxy support to mask your identify and location, use StartPage or DuckDuckGo for your search engine, or disable settings that you think leave you at risk. Whatever your concern, Lightning is here to help. ● Features - Full-screen, check. Adblock, check. Inverted Rendering, check. All the search engines you want, check. Search Suggestions, Bookmarks, History, User Agents, whatever you need, Lightning does it. ● Open-source - Just as Android open-source, so is Lightning. We believe that the best software is built when communities come together to engineer the best solution. Head over to the repository on GitHub to fork, contribute, or translate. Whoever you are, there's a place for you in open-source. Permissions ● permission.INTERNET: Used to access the internet for browsing ● permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Used for downloading files and backing up data ● permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Used for downloading files and restoring data ● permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION: Optional ● permission.READ_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS: Optional ● permission.WRITE_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS: Optional GitHub: https://github.com/anthonycr/Lightning-Browser Beta Tester Community: https://plus.google.com/communities/108746004608718111703 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ACRDevelopment
release_text: 3.2.0.1A First beta * Privacy: Option to disable history sync * Privacy: Clear history/cookies on exit options * Privacy: Orbot proxy support * Feature: Export/Import Bookmarks to backup * Feature: Inverted/Grayscale rendering modes * Feature: New search page UI * Feature: Browser now detects all apps that can open a URL * Feature: Open previous tab - long-press NEW TAB button * Bugfix: Encode search * Bugfix: Updated search suggestions algorithm * UI: Updated Interface * UI: Smoothed animations

description: QUICK ONLINE REFERENCE IN CLINICAL LIFE Gain easy acess to the award-winning AO Surgery Reference. AO Surgery Reference is an online repository for surgical knowledge. It describes the complete surgical management process from diagnosis to aftercare for all fractures of a given anatomical region, and also assembles relevant material that the AO has published before. It gives access to: * Hundreds of surgical procedures and approaches * Surgical decision making made easy with literature evaluated and prepared for quick reference * Hundreds of pages of previously published AO material The idea behind this service is the realization that reference in daily clinical life is often difficult. Frequently, there is little time during a hospital day to consult books or journals, or even to perform a literature search in order to gather evidence for a decision. The AO Surgery Reference allows surgeons to access much of the body of surgical knowledge for reference purposes during their clinical work. You might also want to visit the full-featured web-based version of AO Surgery Refence at www.aosurgery.org.
release_text: • The app will allow for the very first AOSpine material to be launched December 10, 2014. This is a major milestone in the AO Surgery Reference history. • Additional CMF material will be made available for AOCMF members

description: AfriForum GPS, a complete GPS on your smartphone, keeping you on track, with the voice of Steve Hofmeyr, all in Afrikaans! AfriForum GPS offers you: • A complete mobile GPS with voice guided navigation system • Integrated Logbook functionality – logs trips & toll fees • NATIONAL data coverage • 3D Navigation views, voice commands & a bird's eye view with satellite imagery • Send to Friend Menu Option, share locations with the handy Inbox feature – never type an address again, simply Inbox it! • Find addresses and points of interest instantly, using free text search • Trip summary • Route history • Dynamically updates routes for travelling saleswomen and men, and delivery drivers The AfriForum GPS Application is built on the specific operating system of your phone, leveraging the unique features of your handset. The Application makes use of the AfriGIS Navigation Server via the mobile internet, integrated with a high quality AfriGIS map set. Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

description: Esta aplicación muestra la disponibilidad bicicletas del servicio "Mejor en Bici" o "EcoBici" de la Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires en tiempo real ordenándolas por distancia usando GPS. También cuenta con el mapa de ciclovías protegidas, con sus respectivas estaciones. Los datos son provistos por el Mapa de ciclovías de "Mejor en Bici", Gobierno de la Ciudad de Buenos Aires. Para recibir las ultimas novedades, seguinos en Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/paisanoscreando Cualquier queja, sugerencia o idea, por favor contactarnos a info@paisanoscreando.com Esta aplicación NO pertenece al gobierno de la Ciudad de Buenos Aires. This application shows the availability of the service bicycle "Better by Bike" or "EcoBici" of the Autonomous City of Buenos Aires in real time ordering them by distance using GPS. It also has a map of protected bike lanes with their respective seasons. The data are provided by the bikeways map of "Best in Bike", Government of the City of Buenos Aires. To receive the latest news, follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ #! / paisanoscreando Any complaints, suggestions or ideas, please contact us at info@paisanoscreando.com This application does NOT belong to the government of the City of Buenos Aires.

description: 4 Jewels is a fantastic game where you must get 4 lines or columns matching tiles. No time limit, you can play relaxed, but need to think about the movements or strategy or there will be not space on the board. There are seven different types of jewelry, each has a different color and shape, and these will appear in pairs. It is also very important to get the high score, because once achieved you can share with your friends easily. In summary, 4 Jewels is a great and addictive game with which you will spend hours and hours of fun. And remember, try to beat the record every time you play. Good luck !!!

Altimeter is a simple altimeter. The data comes from the gps of the phone. The accuracy of the app depends on the GPS on your device. Units: meters, feet. The height can also be determined via a web service. The altimeter can also be adjusted to zero. The position can be displayed on Google Maps. Requires: GPS, Internet. features - Height in meters and feet - Calibration on Web Service - Calibration to 0 - Spike Filter - Position Share - Multiple backgrounds - Custom background from the gallery of the smartphone more info: http://ldevelop.com Tested with Samsung Galaxy S3, Samsung Galaxy S2, Samsung Galaxy S1 Have any questions, suggestions or problems, please send an email to: altimeter@ldevelop.com

Would you like to know what your children would look like if you had them with your current partner, your ex, the secret love of your life, or a film star? This app gives you a preview! It may sound extraordinary – but it works. Parents confirm that their children actually look like the predictions from this app! This is made possible by using algorithms from forensic science which help you create a preview (photofit) of your future children. How it works: Simply take or upload mobile photos (passport type) of you and your partner. Determine how much the proportion of each parent should be. And then you’re ready for the digital "birth" of your child. See how your child could look at different stages of life. Using this app, you will end up with wonderfully funny photos of your babies and children, which you can use and save as templates. Even more fun: For fun or just for practice you can load 3D model pictures of Brad Pitt, David Beckham, Scarlett Johansson, Penelope Cruz etc. You’ll be amazed when you see what your children with the stars would look like. Or simply check out what the mutual children of, let’s say, Brad Pitt and Scarlett Johansson would look like. Further applications: The app is also good at parties, for a girls’ get together or on a night out with the lads. Have fun “Making Babies”! Your Mobipla Team Note: - requires "Adobe Air"(free) TAGS: kids, baby, baby maker, make a baby, morphing, love, relationship, partnership, family planning, contraception, preview, face, baby face, mom, mother, dad, father, parents, pregnancy, childbirth, desire for children,

Венгерский кроссворд - филворд2 имеет поле. Все поле заполнено буквами, где каждая буква может входить в состав только одного слова. Слова в этом кроссворде не пересекаются и не образуют «крестов». Слова в кроссворде могут изгибаться, но только под прямым углом (по диагонали слова не располагаются), с другими словами не могут иметь общих букв. Слова должны только соприкасаться друг с другом. Филворд содержит 8 категорий: 1. Птицы 2. Рыбы 3. Животные 4. Насекомые 5. Цветы 6. Травы 7. Фрукты и ягоды 8. Овощи Кроссворд содержит картинки-подсказки с загаданными словами. Hungarian crossword - has filvord2 field. All field filled letters, where each letter can only comprise one word. Words in this crossword are disjoint and do not form a "cross." Words in a crossword can be bent, but only at a right angle (diagonal words are not located), with other words can not have common letters. Words only have contact with each other. Feelwords contains 8 categories: 1. Birds 2. Fish 3. Pets 4. Insects 5. Flowers 6. Herbs 7. Fruits and berries 8. Vegetables Crossword contains images with hints of the hidden word.
release_text: Открыты уровни: + Травы + Фрукты и ягоды +Овощи

Jeux éducatifs (4) pour les enfants de 4 à 10 ans. Voix et textes en FRANCAIS. [Version d'essai gratuite / Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité / Version complète : 1,90€] Ces 3 jeux, destinés aux enfants à partir de 3 ans, ont la particularité de rendre l'enfant complètement autonome dans son apprentissage, même s'il ne sait pas lire, car il est uniquement réalisé à partir de symboles simples, et les instructions sont lues clairement (nécessité d’avoir du son). Ce jeu éducatif est entièrement en français (textes et voix). Il y a trois modes de jeux éducatifs : - un jeu de calcul : d'une manière très ludique et interactive, l'enfant va chercher combien il y a de fruits. Il va s'amuser à déplacer les fruits avec son doigt, pour voir s'il n'y aurait pas de fruits cachés. Il devra ensuite les compter et valider sa réponse. - un jeu de différences : une quinzaine de jeux de différences vont permettre à l'enfant d'aiguiser son sens de l'observation. Il va devoir trouver les différences entre deux dessins, a priori similaires. A chaque élément trouvé, un petit décompte lui permet de savoir combien il lui en reste à trouver. - un jeu de reproduction : les fruits teintent dans un ordre précis, et l'enfant devra ensuite reproduire l'ordre de ces fruits. C'est sa concentration et sa mémoire immédiate qui seront énormément stimulés d'une manière très amusante. Une musique très douce accompagne l’enfant dans son exercice, et à chaque fois qu’il répond juste, il est encouragé dans ses efforts par des applaudissements, un rire, et des "bravo". L’interface a été spécialement conçue pour les enfants. Le style graphique est doux et coloré. Les éléments de l'interface se détachent de l’écran de manière vive pour être bien identifiés par l'enfant. Ce jeu permettra à votre enfant d’apprendre, tout en s’amusant, à aiguiser son sens de l'observation, et à s'initier au calcul... et surtout, il passera un très agréable moment. L'enfant est complètement autonome devant ce jeu, car toutes les consignes sont (en français) très clairement. La musique est très douce, et va accompagner l'enfant avec calme dans son jeu. Chaque mini-jeu évolue progressivement. /* Si vous constatez un "bug", n'hésitez surtout pas à m'envoyer un mail : réponse assurée */ /* les mots d'encouragements sont aussi très très appréciés */ Pour l’anecdote, tous mes jeux éducatifs sont "validés" par ma fille de 3 ans et demi (très important, le "demi"). Et croyez-moi, ma fille est très "directe" (pour ne pas dire "sans pitié")... et je ne mets sur le Store que les jeux qui ont passé sa "validation"... Литературное чтение. 1 класс. ФГОС. Ресурс предназначен первоклассникам для занятий по предмету «Литературное чтение». Приложение разработано в соответствии с требованиями Федерального государственного образовательного стандарта начального общего образования и может использоваться с любым учебником, входящим в Федеральный перечень. Приложение включает в себя набор электронных плакатов, которые в наглядной и доступной форме представят детям теоретические сведения из области литературоведения по программе первого класса начальной школы. Содержание приложения: • Малые жанры фольклора • Народные сказки • Литературные (авторские) сказки • Сказки писателей России • Сказки зарубежных писателей • Самуил Яковлевич Маршак • Корней Иванович Чуковский • Владимир Григорьевич Сутеев • Евгений Иванович Чарушин • Виталий Валентинович Бианки • Агния Львовна Барто • Книги о детях • Читаем о животных • Читаем о родной природе • О Родине и родной природе • По страницам любимых книг Система наводящих вопросов, кроссворды и загадки сделают обучение увлекательным и интересным. Интерактивные задания, включенные в каждую тему ресурса, помогут закрепить и проверить знания учащихся. Literary reading. 1 class. GEF. The resource is designed to first-graders for classes on the subject of "Literary reading." Application is developed in accordance with the requirements of the Federal state educational standard primary education and can be used with any textbook included in the federal list.  The application includes a set of electronic posters, which in a clear and accessible way children present theoretical knowledge of the field of literary criticism in the first grade of primary school. Contents of application: • Small folklore genres • Folk Tales • Literature (author) tales • Tales of the Russian Writers • Tales of foreign writers • Samuil Marshak • Roots Chukovsky • Vladimir G. Suteev • Evgeny Charushin • Vitaly V. Bianchi • Agniya Barto • Books for Children • Read about the animals • Read about the mother nature • About the Motherland and nature • pages of favorite books System leading questions, crossword puzzles and riddles will make learning fun and interesting. Interactive exercises that are included in each topic of the resource, will help consolidate and test students' knowledge.

description: >> FREE EDITION - The french video game finally translated for Android ! [Adventure game - Polar interactive U.S. / Guaranteed virus free and without advertising / complete set without additional payment] >> SYNOPSIS After stopping a mafia kingpin, Frederic Hunter, a police officer must hide in the village of his childhood, in France ... But upon his arrival, he discovers the body of a young girl, Laura, at the edge of the river. The adventure begins: examine the body of the victim, browse the village, ask its inhabitants ... and try to discover what happened to poor Laura: suicide, accident or murder? ... Throughout the investigation, the adventure takes a turn most mysterious. What are those lights in the forest ? Why Laura's body appears to have unknown radiations ? What is DRM (French military intelligence services) to the village? Is this the Mafia will find Frederic Hunter ? ... Many puzzles that you must solve in order to understand what is happening in this strange village ... >> RECOMMENDATIONS The game is an interactive detective story ... Without violent content may be likely to shock an audience young or sensitive. It is strictly note recommended for children (-18 years). >> IMPORTANT The game contains a lot of multimedia content (400 MB). In order not to overload the shelf low capacity, the game does not install background images, music and videos. It downloads directly on a server without ever storing. The game weighs no more than 27Mb on card (and 250 ko on ROM). Each image must make less than a second to appear [between 0.75 and instantly dry under normal conditions]. The first images can be longer (a few seconds), but everything falls into place slowly ... The images and their load are optimized. The music and sound effects are pre-loaded from the start of the game. As for the video, it is charged streaming (live).

Jeux éducatifs pour apprendre l'alphabet en douceur. Voix et textes en français. [Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité / VERSION GRATUITE] Jeux éducatifs pour apprendre à reconnaître les lettres de l'alphabet. Ce jeu, destiné aux enfants à partir de 2 ans, a la particularité de rendre l'enfant complètement autonome dans son apprentissage, même s'il ne sait pas lire, car il est uniquement réalisé à partir de symboles simples, et les instructions sont lues clairement (nécessité d’avoir du son). Ce jeu éducatif est entièrement en français (textes et voix). Il y a trois modes de jeux (seul le premier mode est disponible dans la version gratuite) : - un jeu qui invite l'enfant à reconnaître la première lettre d'un animal ("A comme Abeille") - un jeu pour apprendre, facilement, à reconnaître une lettre parmi d'autres - un jeu pour apprendre à reconnaître une lettre parmi de nombreuses autres. Une musique très douce accompagne l’enfant dans son exercice, et à chaque fois qu’il trouve, il est encouragé dans ses efforts par des applaudissements et des "bravo". L’interface a été spécialement conçue pour les enfants. Le style graphique est doux et coloré, et propose une animation de plusieurs "scrollings" pour adoucir l’exercice. Les lettres se détachent de l’écran de manière beaucoup plus vive pour être bien identifiables par l'enfant. Ce jeu permettra à votre enfant d’apprendre, tout en s’amusant, à décrypter les lettres de l’alphabet, à les prononcer, à identifier les animaux (abécédaire)... et surtout, il passera un très agréable moment. La version complète coûte 0,75€... Pour l’anecdote, ce jeu a été réalisé pour ma fille de 3 ans… Devant son succès, je l’ai mis sur le « Play Store ». Je suis sûr qu’il rendra vos enfants tout aussi heureux d’y jouer… Educational games to learn the alphabet smoothly. Voices and texts in French. [Guarantee virus free and no advertising / FREE VERSION] Educational games to learn to recognize the letters of the alphabet. This game, for children from 2 years, has the distinction of making the child completely autonomous in their learning, even if they can not read, because it is only made from simple symbols and instructions are read clearly (need sound). This educational game is entirely in French (text and voice). There are three game modes (only the first mode is available in the free version): - A game which invites the child to recognize the first letter of an animal ("A Bee as") - A game to learn, easy to recognize a letter among other - A game to learn to recognize letter among many others. A very soft music accompanying the child in its exercise, and whenever it is, it is encouraged in his efforts by applause and "bravo". The interface has been specially designed for children. The graphic style is soft and colorful animation and offers a more "scrollings" to soften the exercise. The letters stand for the screen so much more vivid to be easily identifiable by the child. This game will help your child to learn while having fun, to decipher the letters of the alphabet, to pronounce, to identify animals (ABC) ... and most importantly, he spent a very pleasant time. The full version costs € 0.75 ... For the record, this game was made for my 3 year old daughter ... of its success, I put on the "Play Store." I'm sure your children will be just as happy to play ...

description: Experience the coolest feature ever designed for any video keno game. Our Move Pattern Technology allows you to move all your patterns with just 2 keystrokes* You no longer have to erase all your patterns, and then re-enter them, if you want to chase numbers. Once you use our Simplified Wagering Method you're probably going to think “DUH” why wasn't this done before? 3 RNG’s to select from Standard, Loose and Super Loose Play tight patterns, using the Super Loose setting, and you're going to see some MEGA HIT’S BABY Autoplay up to 10 games. Can you produce the ball on the box in this logical puzzle game? This popular browser puzzle game is now on mobile too, with more levels, new graphics and new music! "Factory Balls is an essential mobile game, I loved this game so much that I wanted it to go on and on and on." - indiestatik.com "Straightforward and deceptively tough, Factory Balls is perfect for players who crave a mental workout. It's simple, attractive to look at, and refreshingly tricky." - pocketgamer.co.uk "Get ready for a new generation of infuriating, satisfying sphere painting. Its brand of puzzles are perfect for casual on-the-go play." - jayisgames.com The objective of the game is to change the shape and colour of a white ball and match a picture pasted on the side of the open box, by using the ball with a set of different tools provided. Can you produce the ball on the box in each level? Drag and drop the ball over the tools or just tap the tools. The game supports all Android screen sizes (phones and tablets) and was featured by Google! Factory Balls is a bontegames game by Bart Bonte, the game you know from coolmath, hoodamath and many other gamesites, but completely redesigned for mobile with new graphics and many new levels.

description: Enter the Enchanted Cave, collecting artifacts, stat gems and gold as you fight to reach floor 100! Use the Escape Wings to teleport out and recover, then head back in with powerful artifacts to delve deeper into the cave each time. Improvements from the flash game: - User interface completely redone for small touchscreens. - Tap to move where you want to go with smart pathfinding - you won't walk into a monster unless you tap their exact square. - Fast-find an item in your inventory by tapping it when you open a chest. - A "Sell Junk" button in the shop to quickly sell all of your non-artifact, non-potion old equipment. - Damage and Magic formulas simplified and re-balanced (Attack magic is useful now!). - Magic window to allow you quickly cast a spell without opening your inventory. - Potions window to quickly use potions without opening your inventory. - Saving can be anywhere in the cave to be picked up later. Auto saves each floor. - Walk on empty gold bags. - Low-life warning. - New title screen. - Higher stairs contrast. - Faster movement. Future games / Enchanted Cave 2 updates: https://twitter.com/dustinaux https://www.facebook.com/dustinaux http://dustinauxier.com

"YOOM manga" is the perfect Manga comic viewer for small devices such as tablets and smartphones. It's intelligent frame detection technology brings you a perfect Manga comic reading experience. (1) Zoom In and Out "YOOM manga" frame detection engine perform automated zooming in and out. Each frame scrolls smoothly in the playback mode. without manual panning and zooming, You can enjoy large images in the small screen of the mobile phone. (2) Multi-Device, Multi-Screen Resolution YOOM manga supports both tablets and smartphones. It's user interfaces are optimized depending on the screen size and orientation. (3) Automated Frame-By-Frame Reading You can read next page continuously without touching or swiping. YOOM provides you a fully automated frame-by-frame reading. Mirroring your device's display on your TV, you can enjoy a perfect manga reading experience. (4) ZIP Compressed JPEG Images "YOOM manga" is specialized in manga images which you have scanned by yourself. Images should use a compressed format such as JPEG or PNG, with a serial number, be packaged as a zip format file. http://www.e-hearts.net
release_text: - recompiled with the latest SDK. - minor bug fix.

description: Based on our hit game show, GSN presents the official American Bible Challenge Game! Test your Bible knowledge, earn as many points as you can, and compete with your friends and fellow group members to achieve the highest score. Show host Jeff Foxworthy will encourage you throughout the game as you unlock new rounds and levels. This game features four different question types that span the entirety of the Good Book. Answer correctly and you'll be racking up points for yourself and your group, and moving up the Leaderboard. Answer incorrectly, and you'll get new chapters in your Bible Study that will help you get those questions right the next time. Ready to play? Download the free app now, and don't forget to tune in to The American Bible Challenge on GSN - The Game Show Network.

Burger party for racing drivers - Hey Guys, you have to put up your Burger Stall in the Racing Track and the challenge for you is to make a quick burger for the racing drivers. You do not have much time because the pit stop is just for few seconds. You have to select the ingredients stand, fries, fruit juice, bagel burger, onion, lettuce, tomato, cheese, meat burger, and add a little ketchup. Please note that every racer leader wants different burger, and you must meet the requirements. Success

FEATURES - *NEW* Rate drinks and view the top rated drinks as determined by other iBartender users. - Carefully researched recipes for many of the most popular mixed drinks, cocktails and shots. - All recipes are bundled with the app - no internet connection required. - 'Discover' shows you the drinks you can make with what you have on hand. - Search by drink name or ingredient(s). - Images for one third of the drinks with more added each update. - Simple, easy to use interface. - Free future upgrades with more drinks and more features. Please drink responsibly.

description: New Generation of HD MP4 and FLV Video Player. Extremely high quality of image and sound. NO Flash® player is required. Watch your videos from either SD card or internal memory. Select your favorite videos to create your personal playlist from it. Search files in SD card and internal memory and watch the found results in the playlist. You can control sound volume in the application itself. You can control aspect ratio of the video(100%, stretch saving aspect ratio, fullscreen stretch). Kids Puzzle - educational game for kids from 1 to 6 years. This game improves different skills. We are sure your child will enjoy colorful planes The aim of the game is to move the icons and pictures of different planes and choppers to the correspondent contour. You have to match all the objects with their contours to pass the level. Air balloons make victory pleasant after each level. Features: - 15 levels - Two levels of difficulty: 4 pieces puzzle and 6 pieces puzzle - Designed specifically for kids - Easy and understandable interface for any child - Colourful and bright pictures and interface - Improves your kid's fine motor skills - Small app size Kids Puzzle will surely make your kid happy.

Knobeln is an easy to learn and funny dice game. It is very similar to popular dice games like Farkle, Dice 10000 or Zilch. It's up to you, if you are going to play a short and amusing round or a challenging dice marathon session with a higher score limit. Leave pen, paper and your dice cup at home and enjoy playing dice with this app whenever and wherever you want. This game features a single player mode with up to 3 computer controlled opponents and a local multiplayer allowing you to play against up to 3 of your friends on your device. Compare your scores and accomplishments in 3 different leaderboards with other players and collect a bunch of achievments on your way to the top. Test your luck and become the king of Knobeln. Please send us your feedback and criticism about this little game and help us to improve the game with every new version. Have fun!
release_text: - updated Google Play Games service - minor bug-fixes

description: Zilch is an amusing and easy to learn dice game of skill and luck. This game features a single player mode with up to 3 computer controlled opponents and a local multiplayer allowing you to play against up to 3 of your friends on your device. The game contains a short manual and an ingame tutorial explaining all features to you, if you do not know Zilch, yet. Compare your scores and accomplishments in 3 different leaderboards with other players and collect a bunch of achievments on your way to the top. Leave pen, paper and your dice cup at home and enjoy playing dice with this app whenever and wherever you want. Please send us your feedback and criticism about this little game and help us to improve the game with every new version. Have fun!

Collect the virtual stickers by taking part in the paper chase hosted by the Zoo Salzburg and get a surprise for finishing your sticker album. Navigate to the interesting animals, complete your virtual sticker album and share the photos with your friends. So beside the paper chase you get some beautiful personal photos of one of the most beautiful zoos in Europe. COMPASS: If the integrated compass is not working as it is supposed to be, move your smartphone away from interference, or re-calibrate it by moving the device in a figure 8 motion. OFFLINE functionality: The app can be used without any internet connection (exception: Entering contest, Facebook postings and updates). Therefore NO ROAMING FEES will incur during the usage. ATTENTION: The option "GPS in background" gives you the possibility of notifications when you are around a sticker position. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life! This mobile App was developed by Fosbury (www.fosbury.at) for the Zoo Salzburg. If you need support with the app please contact our support staff at android@fosbury.at .

Your toddler can flip the “pages” in this app to match the parts of each animal to make one whole picture. Young children are fascinated with animals, and this simple and fun app allows them to put the body of various animals together correctly. They’ll be sure to have some giggles as they flip through the book and see some mismatched parts like the head of a tiger on the tail of a whale! Features: - Introduces animals - Offers easy touchscreen flip functionality - Explores the concept of matching - Tested by babies and toddlers About BabyFirst: BabyFirst is the leading TV network made just for babies, toddlers and parents. Developed by educational experts, BabyFirst shows inspire a variety of developmental skills. Get BabyFirst on TV, online and in your mobile app store. Visit www.babyfirsttv.com

Now FREE for a limited time, the hit nursery app, ABC with VocabuLarry! Join everyone’s favorite talking parrot, VocabuLarry, as he introduces all the letters of the alphabet! From the hit TV series on BabyFirst comes another engaging and interactive app made specifically for young toddlers. In ABC with VocabuLarry, your child will see a letter and a common word that starts with that letter. Swipe left and right to scroll through all the letters. As a new letter appears on-screen, VocabuLarry says the letter. With the touch of a finger, an object beginning with that letter appears, and Larry says what the object is, helping your little one pronounce the words and letters. Features: *Introduces kids to letters and common objects *Explores hand-eye coordination *Tested by babies and toddlers *Features the character from the hit TV show VocabuLarry on BabyFirst *Responds to tilting, touching, and swiping to fully engage your child *Bright colors and playful sounds hold babies’ and toddlers’ attention ABC with VocabuLarry provides mental stimulation while allowing tots to interact with a cheerful character! Your little one can giggle and play while learning the ABCs with this adorable and amusing preschool app! Download today! About BabyFirst: BabyFirst is a global TV network made just for babies, toddlers and parents. Developed by educational experts, all BabyFirst content is designed to introduce babies to basic building blocks from numbers and language to music and art. Look for BabyFirst in the U.S. on Comcast, DIRECTV, Dish Network, AT&T U-verse, and more. www.babyfirsttv.com To find more trusted applications from the BabyFirst family of apps, search ""BF123"" in the Google Play Store.

app_name: つくろう！恐竜大図鑑～第一章 古代の覇王編～ライト版
description: つくろう！恐竜大図鑑は化石の発掘、恐竜の調査をおこないながら、キミの手で図鑑を作っていく新感覚の図鑑アプリです。 【注】こちらは機能が制限されたライト版（無料）になります。すべての内容を楽しむにはにはフル版（有料）が必要になります。 ※不具合報告はコメントからでなく、メールにてご連絡ください。（対処法がエラー原因、端末によりことなるため）　お手数おかけしますが、よろしくおねがいいたします。 ハイクオリティ３DCGの恐竜をスマートフォンの直感的な操作で３６０°観察し、発見する喜びをダイレクトに感じながら、恐竜の神秘を解き明かしていきます。 かんたん操作で、お楽しみいただけるようシンプルなUIになっています。また文字にはすべてルビを使用しましたのでお子さんといっしょに遊んでいただけます。 ★ここがすごい！～その１～ 恐竜のイメージはハリウッド映画で使用される開発ツールで作成。通常の図鑑では体感できない圧倒的なリアリティにこだわりました。 うろこ、羽毛まで詳細に作り込まれた驚異のCGイメージを高画質でお楽しみいただけます。 ★ここがすごい！～その２～ 発見をくりかえすことで、恐竜の復元モデルがどんどんレベルアップしていきます。 おなじ恐竜でも調査レベルをアップさせることにより、昔子供の頃に見たなつかしい恐竜から羽毛や鳥の配色に似せた最新のモデルまで様々なタイプが閲覧可能です。恐竜の未知の部分をさまざまな選択肢を用意することで想像力を刺激します。 さらに恐竜以外の古代生物も収録。 レアな化石として恐竜以外の古代生物が発掘できます。 すべてを発掘するのは相当難しいので、ちょっとした暇潰しのお供としてご利用いただけます。 ■ライト版とフル版について 無料で体験できるライト版と有料のフル版がございます。 ライト版では図鑑の完成度５０％まで、調査レベル４までお楽しみいただけます。 フル版では全コンテンツお楽しみいただけます。

description: Pull up your sleeves and unveil the miner in you, tapping your screen in a exciting quest to find the most rare and expensive elements in the universe. It’s easy to play, just tap your phone to mine the rocks in the search of the most exciting elements in the universe. Accumulate resources and use them wisely in other to acquire more efficient tools. Will you become the greatest virtual miner in this galaxy? Prove yourself and start playing Pickaxe
Select your dozer and bulldoze the load to the end of each level. Use the loader to lift and destroy things that are in your way. Can you handle being a dozer driver?

You will enjoy it! features: - 5 sets of beautifully prepared skins for every dish you can imagine - automatic place recognition - location information from Foursquare or Facebook - works on your old photos (as long as metadata contains location)

Welcome to FireJumpers Sandbox, a real-time co-operative multi-player wildfire fighting simulation! This game is very different than most other games. There is no score nor achievements and things like that. Instead, it's about you, your friends and the fire. It's a game of co-operation, strategy and fun! Based loosely on our one-player game (FireJumpers RTS), the Sandbox puts you in control: - draw your own fires - set the speed and direction of the wind - decide on your units - and most importantly, play cooperatively with your friends! We've been listening to all your comments and suggestions from our previous game and we have rebuilt everything from the ground up using a super fast gaming framework (no more lag)! This game includes: - pinch-zoom - improved smoke and fire particle system - improved water bomber - online chat - as well as a brand new feature called "Push-to-talk" button. This "Walkie-Talkie" option allows you to speak directly to other players within the game! Yeah, that just happened! :) So enjoy the Sandbox while we keep improving the game with new units, new maps and more functionality! And please, be nice with your star ratings while we work out the bugs! We're just a 2-person Indie company! IMPORTANT DATA-USAGE NOTE: Due to the push-to-talk feature, we recommend playing Sandbox on WiFi. ABOUT US: By Redblox Games, an "indie" developer. We hope you enjoy playing this game as much as we enjoyed building it! For more information and strategies, visit our website at: redbloxgames.com PROFESSIONAL USE: This game can be used for training. Please contact us for more information.
release_text: v0.6.8 - New P3 Retardant Bomber - New Explosive Unit! - Updated Bomber and Martin Mars graphics - Improved News and Updates panel, now has links! - Minor interface improvements - Smokejumper bugs fixed

description: The first made-for-tablet story that challenges the conventions of the tablet reading experience The Last Hunt features: – Smooth, intuitive scrolling that provides a seamless storytelling experience – A compelling narrative about family and tradition – Beautiful images by Montreal photographer Alexi Hobbs – Text overlaid with parallaxing interactive animation Offering a new kind of interactive reading experience, The Last Hunt explores the strength of family bonds and the spirituality implicit in the act of hunting, delving deeply into the motivations that led Montreal photographer Alexi Hobbs to document his grandfather’s last hunting expedition. To follow the story, which stretches from the present moment back to the Second World War, app users scroll vertically through text overlaid with delicate, parallaxing interactive animation that challenges the conventions of the tablet reading experience. Produced by the National Film Board of Canada Created by the NFB Digital Studio Story and Photography by Alexi Hobbs
